translation.en: [Optimus] We were once a peaceful race of intelligent, mechanical beings.
translation.zh:
我们曾经是一个和平的种族
是拥有高等智慧的机械生物

translation.en: But then came the war
translation.zh: 之后因为内部不合发生战争

translation.en: between the Autobots, who fought for freedom,
translation.zh: 一派是为自由而战的博派变形金刚

translation.en: and the Decepticons, who dreamt of tyranny.
translation.zh: 另一派则是妄想独裁的狂派变形金刚

translation.en: Overmatched and outnumbered,
translation.zh: 因为敌众我寡 我们的失败是必然的

translation.en: But in the war's final days,
one Autobot ship escaped the battle.
It was carrying a secret cargo,
translation.zh: 飞船上携带着一种秘密货物

translation.en: which would have changed our planet's fate.
translation.zh: 它或可挽救我们星球的命运

translation.en: A desperate mission.
Our final hope.
A hope that vanished.
[man 1] One up there. One over there.
And one more down there.
What you got?
[man 2] Impact detected.
We have impact confirmed.
Contact at 2250 GMT.
translation.zh:
确认撞击发生在 -格林威治时间22点50分
-什么？

translation.en: Get me SecDef on the phone right away.
[man] Mr. McNamara, the President is expecting you.
translation.zh: 麦克纳马拉先生 总统在等您

translation.en: [McNamara] Mr. President, designation, top secret.
translation.zh:
-叫鲍比进来
-总统先生 这是最高机密

translation.en: We believe a UFO has crashed into the moon.
translation.zh: 一个不明飞行物撞上了月球

translation.en: We think the Russians are onto it as well.
translation.zh: 我们认为俄国人也在调查此事

translation.en: Well, then you tell NASA to move heaven and earth. We need to get to the moon.
translation.zh:
你告诉太空总署竭尽全力去调查
我们需要登月

translation.en: [McNamara] We're going to attempt a manned mission.
translation.zh: 我们要进行一次载人太空任务

translation.en: NASA said it would take five years.
You get there before the Russians.
translation.zh: 一定要赶在俄国人之前登月

translation.en: [Kennedy] I believe that this nation should commit itself
translation.zh: 我相信我们应该倾全国之力...

translation.en: to achieving the goal,
before this decade is out,
of landing a man on the moon and returning him safely to the Earth.
translation.zh: 即登上月球后 安然返回地球

translation.en: [NASA technician] Ignition sequence start.
Five, four, three...
...two, one.
translation.zh: 五 四 三 二

translation.en: All engines running.
Liftoff. We have a liftoff.
Thirty-two minutes past the hour. Liftoff on Apollo 11.
translation.zh:
3点32分阿波罗11号
发射升空成功

translation.en: Neil Armstrong reporting Apollo 11 on proper heading.
translation.zh:
尼尔阿姆斯特朗报告
阿波罗11号航向正确

translation.en: Apollo 11 is on the way,
translation.zh: 阿波罗11号乘着土星5号火箭的...

translation.en: riding that pillar of flame
translation.zh: 阿波罗11号乘着土星5号火箭的... ...助推火焰...

translation.en: from the Saturn V out there, 250,000 miles away,
translation.zh: ...助推火焰... 飞向25万英里外的月球

translation.en: where the moon is waiting
for man's first arrival.
translation.zh: 此时的月球正等待... ...人类的第一次造访

translation.en: Houston, you're a go for landing. Over.
translation.zh: 休斯敦呼叫 你们可以着陆

translation.en: [Buzz] Forty feet, down two-and-a-half. Picking up some dust.
translation.zh:
离月球表面40英尺
速度每秒2.5英尺 有灰尘落在登月舱

translation.en: Thirty feet, two-and-a-half down. Faint shadow.
translation.zh:
30英尺 速度不变
可依稀看见登月舱的影子

translation.en: Capcom, Flight.
translation.zh: 这是飞船连络员 收到

translation.en: Four forward. Drifting to the right a little.
translation.zh: 向前4英尺 向右飘移一点

translation.en: Down a half.
Contact light.
Okay, engine stop.
[Neil] Houston,
translation.zh: 休斯敦 这里是宁静基地

translation.en: Tranquility Base here.
translation.zh: （第一张现场照片 来自月球）

translation.en: [technician] We copy you down, Eagle.
You got a bunch of guys about to turn blue. We're breathing again.
translation.zh:
小鹰 我们已收到 我们屏息等待
现在又能呼吸了

translation.en: [Cronkite] Perhaps 400 million persons
translation.zh: （最高机密） 大概有4亿人在看这场实况转播...

translation.en: are watching this broadcast today
translation.zh: 大概有4亿人在看这场实况转播...

translation.en: of the greatest event in our time,
translation.zh:
...观看这个具有划时代意义的
人类历史上...

translation.en: and one of the great events of all recorded history.
translation.zh:
...观看这个具有划时代意义的
人类历史上... ...前所未有的事件

translation.en: [Neil] I'm at the foot of the ladder.
Okay, I'm gonna step off the LEM now.
That's one small step for man,
one giant leap for mankind.
-Are we good? -[man 1] Yes, sir.
[man 2, over radio] Unofficial time on the first step, 109--
translation.zh:
踏出第一步非正式的时间是
1:09分

translation.en: [technician] Apollo 11? This is Houston, over.
translation.zh:
阿波罗11号 这里是休斯敦
请回话

translation.en: Eagle, we're getting a signal interference. Do you copy?
translation.zh: 小鹰 我们的信号有干扰 请回答

translation.en: [Cronkite] We now have had confirmation
of loss of signal from the Apollo 11.
translation.zh:
...已与阿波罗11号... ...失去联系
此时它正在月球的另一面

translation.en: The Apollo 11 is, at the moment, on the far side of the moon.
translation.zh:
...失去联系
此时它正在月球的另一面

translation.en: Neil, you are dark on the rock.
translation.zh: 尼尔 你已失去无线电联系

translation.en: Mission is a go.
We have 21 minutes.
My God.
It's some sort of giant metal face.
translation.zh: 这是一种巨大的金属头部

translation.en: Jesus.
Control, we are inside the ship.
translation.zh: 控制中心 我们已进入飞船

translation.en: Extensive damage.
Way too big to check the entire ship.
translation.zh: 飞船太大 无法全部检查

translation.en: Everything is dead in here, Houston.
translation.zh: 休斯敦 这里死一般的寂静

translation.en: No signs of life anywhere.
These things are massive.
We copy. You've got seven minutes on your oxygen.
translation.zh: 收到 你的氧气供应只剩7分钟

translation.en: We are not alone after all, are we?
translation.zh: 存在外星生物 对吧？

translation.en: No, sir. We're not alone.
[man] Go ahead, Mr. President.
[Nixon] Hello, Neil and Buzz. I'm talking to you by telephone
translation.zh:
尼尔 巴斯 你们好
我现在用电话与你们通话

translation.en: from the Oval Room at the White House.
translation.zh: 我在白宫的椭圆办公室里

translation.en: And this certainly has to be the most historic telephone call ever made.
translation.zh: 这肯定是历史上最重要的一个电话

translation.en: I just can't tell you how proud we all are of what you've done.
translation.zh: 我们为你们感到无比骄傲

translation.en: For every American, this has to be the proudest day of our lives.
translation.zh: 这也是美国人民最骄傲的一天

translation.en: Because of what you have done...
[technician] We have splashdown.
[Nixon] ...the heavens have become a part of man's world.
translation.zh: 从而使宇宙变为... ...人类世界的一部分

translation.en: For one priceless moment...
in the whole history of man...
all the people on this earth are truly one.
translation.zh: ...把全世界的人都团结在一起

translation.en: One in their pride in what you have done.
It inspires us to redouble our efforts
translation.zh: 这也激励我们加倍努力...

translation.en: to bring peace and tranquility to earth.
translation.zh: ...为世界的和平与安定而奋斗

translation.en: [Carly] My hero needs to wake up.
What is that?
This is your new lucky bunny.
Well, it's a beautiful thought, Carly, but I don't think it's the whole bunny that's lucky.
translation.zh:
卡莉 多谢你盛情
但幸运兔并不是全身都幸运

translation.en: You see, it's just this section here.
You see, it's just the rabbit foot that's lucky.
Well, it's just a good luck charm. To help you think positive?
translation.zh: 这只是幸运符 来帮你积极面对困难

translation.en: Today's important.
Come on, get up.
Hey, wear that nice tie. Yeah.
You need any money for lunch?
No, I don't need any money for lunch. I have money from yesterday's lunch.
translation.zh: 不需要 昨天的午餐费还没花完呢

translation.en: [Sam] You love it, don't you? I'm just your American boy toy.
translation.zh: 你很享受把我当小白脸嘛

translation.en: [chuckles] A lover boy toy.
You know how demoralizing it is to have saved the world twice
and still be groveling for a job?
People don't know you saved the world, Sam. I mean, I do. I believe you.
translation.zh: 别人不知道你拯救过地球但我信你

translation.en: The government knows. I mean, they could have hooked me up with a job right here in D.C.
translation.zh:
政府也知道
他们本可以在华府替我谋一份差事

translation.en: I mean, I should be working with the Autobots, otherwise, it's not fair.
translation.zh: 我应该跟博派工作 真不公平

translation.en: Come on, they paid for your college. The President gave you a hero medal.
translation.zh:
政府替你交大学学费
总统还颁了英勇奖牌

translation.en: [Obama] Thank you, man. Great job.
[whispering] That's the coolest thing that ever happened to me.
translation.zh: 那是我最春风得意的一刻

translation.en: [Obama] All right, guys... [whispering] What the fuck!
Wow. And, as I recall, that wasn't even the highlight of your day.
translation.zh: 那还不算你人生的高光时刻

translation.en: Mr. Ambassador, here. [woman] British Embassy, you're up next.
translation.zh:
-大使先生 请用
-英国大使 下一个是你

translation.en: [Judy] No, you don't wear it. See, you've gotta... The box.
[Sam] I couldn't, even if I wanted to.
translation.zh:
你竟然从盒里拿出来
应该好好珍藏在盒子里 好吗？

translation.en: You keep it in this. What a gorgeous box.
translation.zh: 放在这个漂亮的盒子里

translation.en: Oh, yeah. My medal. You know who gave that to me?
-Who? -POTUS.
President of the United States.
Babe, it's hard for everybody to get a job.
translation.zh: 这年月大家求职都很难

translation.en: I don't have time. You see, my parents are gonna be here in a week on their road trip Partybus World Tour.
translation.zh:
我没时间了 我爸妈他们在
开车环游世界 下个星期就到

translation.en: If my dad gets here and I don't have a job,
translation.zh: 到那时如果我爸爸见我还没找到工作

translation.en: he's gonna spank me. You know, it's go time for me.
translation.zh: 他会收拾我的 那就难熬了

translation.en: All right, tonight, I'll give you a job.
translation.zh: 今晚我就给你一份工作

translation.en: Romance me with a nice dinner, and maybe you can get that bonus.
translation.zh:
跟我共进一顿浪漫的晚餐
也许会有花红拿

translation.en: -Get lucky. -[Carly] Get him out of here!
[Brains] Wait. No, no, no, no.
[Carly] Oh, he's gross!
-She's good. -I'm sorry, but they're stranded here.
translation.zh:
-他真恶心！
-她很不错 他们被困在这里 得有人照顾他们

translation.en: Somebody's got to watch out for them.
translation.zh: 他们被困在这里 得有人照顾他们

translation.en: Yesterday, that one was in my underwear drawer.
translation.zh: 昨天 那个家伙躲在我的内衣柜子里

translation.en: Did research. Looking real good, too. [chuckles] Oh! No need to hit me, man.
translation.zh: 研究过了 好性感喔 别打我

translation.en: You are not a normal boyfriend. That's what you love about me.
translation.zh:
-你不是一个普通的男友
-那正是我可爱之处

translation.en: -[Brains] Crybaby. -We're not at the love word yet. Maybe a little bit closer when you're covering your half of the rent.
translation.zh:
我们关系还没到那种地步呢
当你付另外一半房租时 就不远了

translation.en: -[knock on door] -Goodbye.
[Wheelie] Frickin' shorting my circuits out here!
translation.zh: 该死的雨把我弄短路了

translation.en: It's inhumane, what it is! Make us live in a box
translation.zh: 我们遭受了非人的待遇

translation.en: on a balcony, right next to a beast! Like a common animal!
translation.zh:
让我们住在阳台上的箱子里
与动物同伍

translation.en: Stop, okay? You and your creepy sidekick, you can't be in here without permission.
translation.zh:
你和你讨厌的跟班未经许可
不能进来

translation.en: According to who? Miss Blondie Blonde?
translation.zh: 谁的许可？那个金发女郎？

translation.en: Giddyup, little doggie! Hyah!
Yo, Brains, wassup? Doing good.
translation.zh:
-嘿 脑残 怎么样了？
-挺好的

translation.en: Shit, I seen this one. It's the one where Spock goes nuts.
translation.zh:
糟糕 我看过这集
斯伯克在这集疯的

translation.en: You know, Sam, I don't know about moving in with this chick. What if she dumps us like the last girl?
translation.zh:
山姆 我不晓得跟
这妞住一起是否明智

translation.en: She was mean. Didn't like her.
translation.zh: 那个女孩很坏 很讨厌

translation.en: Us guys got to stick together.
translation.zh: 我们该站在同一个战线

translation.en: No, we're not family. You're a political refugee,
translation.zh: 我们不是一家人 你是政治难民

translation.en: and I have finally found someone who appreciates me for me.
translation.zh: 而我找到了一个认可我个性的人

translation.en: Well, you tell her that we're not your pets, and we're not your toys!
translation.zh: 跟她讲我们不是你的宠物或玩偶

translation.en: All right? We're an advanced, genius alien race just looking for a home.
translation.zh:
我们是一群高度发达的纯种外星人
就是要找一个家

translation.en: -[Judy] Maybe it wasn't such a good idea. -[Ron] Didn't have to stop.
Come on. What're they going to do, tow it?
translation.zh: 他们怎么办 把它拖走？

translation.en: Where is he?
[gasps] Sammy!
-Oh, come on, that's funny! Ha-ha. -Sam.
I missed you guys so much.
Sure, you did. What do you think?
translation.zh: 口是心非 我们的穿戴如何？

translation.en: -[Sam] Look at that. -[Judy] Cute.
-[Sam] You look old. -[Judy] Stop it. [Sam] Feel like I can see the end.
[Judy] I love your little tie. Hey, where's my girl?
translation.zh:
-土埋半截了
-你的领带真带劲

translation.en: -Where's my beautiful Carly? -She's at work, Ma. She's got a new job. You guys said you were gonna be here in a week.
The 21st, not the 11th, Dad, remember?
translation.zh:
你们说一周后才到呢
是21号 不是11号

translation.en: We just hauled ass in this thing. -We stopped for gas. -This thing. The love tub, it flies.
translation.zh:
-我们急急忙忙就赶来了
-这车好快 像在飞

translation.en: Oh, are we keeping you from something? Like, say, your job?
translation.zh:
我们没有妨碍你吧？
最好别耽误你工作

translation.en: Well, it's about time. You had us worried.
translation.zh: 有工作就好 我们那时还担心呢

translation.en: I have job interviews.
Oh. That's good.
-That sucks. -Stop it.
You don't have to be so negative, Dad. You know, you're in D.C.
translation.zh: 你不需要这么悲观 爸爸

translation.en: You're here with your son and your family.
translation.zh: 毕竟我们一家在华盛顿团聚了

translation.en: -I mean, it's a good time. -It sucks that you don't have a job.
translation.zh:
-你工作没着落
-在这里要玩的地方很多

translation.en: Yeah, but there's good things to do here, too, right? -Yeah. -Right? Museums and monuments, okay?
-I'll see you tonight. -[Ron] I'm bagging the gift.
translation.zh:
-有博物馆 纪念碑
-不要... -晚上见
-礼物先留着

translation.en: [Judy] Sam, I think for an interview you should wear real pants.
translation.zh: 面试就要穿正式的裤子

translation.en: [Sam] I think for life, you should wear real pants.
translation.zh: 出外见人 你们也不能穿得太随便

translation.en: -[Judy] Oh, what happened to Bumblebee? -[Ron] Jesus.
He's off on his missions. I had to get this for backup.
-[Ron] Your car has a job, huh? -[Judy] Stop.
translation.zh:
-我这有备用车
-连你的车都有工作？

translation.en: What does it change into?
It doesn't change into anything. It's a collector's item, Ma. I got it for a steal. It just needs some work. Trust me.
translation.zh: 这是古董 需要收拾一下

translation.en: [Judy] No, I think it's darling. It reminds me a lot of Bumblebee,
translation.zh: 它多可爱 使我想起了大黄蜂

translation.en: if Bumblebee were a sad piece of shit.
translation.zh: 如果大黄蜂是一辆烂车

translation.en: [Judy] Come on, we'll give you a ride!
[Optimus] In the years since our arrival, our new home, Earth,
translation.zh: 自从我们来到我们的新家 地球...

translation.en: has seen much change.
Energon detectors guard its cities now.
translation.zh: 超能量侦测器保护着地球的城市

translation.en: Long-range defense systems watch the skies.
translation.zh: 远距防卫系统捍卫地球的领空

translation.en: So now we assist our allies in solving human conflicts,
translation.zh:
中东-非法核基地 现在我们协助我们的盟友
解决人类的冲突

translation.en: to prevent mankind from bringing harm to itself.
[in Arabic] The Defense Minister's car.
[laughs] On the ground, per favore! And stay there!
translation.zh: 趴在地上 不准起来！

translation.en: [Optimus] We work in secret teams on various missions around the globe.
translation.zh: 我们在世界各地组成秘密小组

translation.en: And all the while,
translation.zh: 同时也在留意我们真正

translation.en: we search for signs of our true enemies' return.
[Voshkod] I am Voshkod, General Counsel with Ukrainian Department of Energy.
translation.zh:
我是沃斯霍德
乌克兰能源部的首席律师

translation.en: My government will officially deny
that we're having this conversation.
At one of our decommissioned facilities, a discovery was made,
translation.zh: 我们在一座废弃的核能发电厂发现了

translation.en: which I fear may be alien in nature.
translation.zh: 疑似外星生物的活动迹象

translation.en: The facility's name is Chernobyl.
translation.zh: 那座核电厂就是切尔诺贝利

translation.en: [Lennox] Mr. Voshkod.
So, uninhabited since '86. I hear it won't be livable again for another 20,000 years?
translation.zh:
自从1986年就是空城
听说两万年内都不适合人类居住

translation.en: At least. Ukraine was the most fertile land. It's a tragedy.
translation.zh:
至少两万年
真可惜 乌克兰是片丰腴的土地

translation.en: This way.
[Lennox] Gear up! We have 60 minutes on the ground.
translation.zh: 准备好检查仪器！只有60分钟

translation.en: Watch your radiation levels.
Mr. Voshkod, where's your protective gear?
translation.zh: 沃斯霍德先生 你的防护装备呢？

translation.en: Where's your protective gear?
It would not matter. For me, it's only a matter of time.
Through the school.
Yuri will take you below. And one other thing, Colonel.
translation.zh: 尤里会带你们下去 还有一件事 上校 不要张扬

translation.en: In private, there were some energy experiments--
translation.zh: 还有一件事 上校 不要张扬 这里进行过能源试验

translation.en: [gasps] It can wait.
[Lennox] Keep moving. Stay tight.
[soldier] Okay, right here. I think I found it.
[Lennox] Optimus, we got a visual.
translation.zh: 擎天柱 我们看到了

translation.en: Looks like the object's clamped in some kind of a metal harness.
translation.zh:
看起来这东西像是被什么
金属链捆住了

translation.en: What's this? Guys!
Why does this thing have Soviet space program markings on it?
translation.zh:
为什么这上面刻着
苏联太空计划的标记？

translation.en: [Lennox] Sputnik?
translation.zh:
-人造卫星？
-先生 侦测到超能量

translation.en: [soldier] Energon readings, sir. It's strong.
Below us. It's coming fast.
translation.zh: 在下面 那东西速度很快

translation.en: Contact, contact!
[Lennox] Get topside now! Move, move, move!
-Let's go! -Weapons up! Heavy weapons up!
Stay behind me!
soldier: Go! Go!
Optimus!
[Lennox] Fall back!
It's circling around us! -It's taking our flank! -Come on!
translation.zh:
-它在我们周围绕圈！
-它在攻我们的侧翼

translation.en: [soldier] Get the heavy weapon!
Optimus!
What the hell was that thing?
[Optimus] That... is Shockwave.
Why was he after this?
It's impossible.
This is an engine part from a long lost Autobot ship.
translation.zh:
这是一个失踪已久的
博派飞船的引擎零件

translation.en: Pleasure working with you.
translation.zh: 与你共事 荣幸之至

translation.en: [Judy] Interviews. This is so exciting.
Honey, do you want some gum? Your breath gets really gnarly when you're nervous.
translation.zh: 要吃口香糖吗？你一紧张就有口臭

translation.en: Mr. Witwicky? Yeah. Search is over.
I'm Mr. Whitley.
Mr...
Is anybody else joining? No.
No? You want me to move right there? -I'll move right there. -I'd prefer not.
translation.zh:
-我可以坐到那边吗？
-最好不要

translation.en: Sensei.
[Matsumoto] Ready? Begin.
translation.zh:
-准备好了吗？开始吧
-今年毕业的

translation.en: Graduated this year. Majored in geopolitics, minor in tech studies.
translation.zh: 主修地缘政治学 辅修技术研究

translation.en: Very interested in government and technology, how that's gonna intersect and co-exist.
translation.zh: 兴趣是政府和科技的结合

translation.en: Shape the future.
[Ron] Why did we bother sending him to an Ivy college for?
translation.zh: 我们干嘛让他念长春藤大学？

translation.en: Three months out of school and he can't find a job?
translation.zh: 毕业三个月还找不到工作？

translation.en: Mr. Masuhisu...
-Matsumoto. -Hasi... -Matsumoto. -Moto.
-Martha, can I call you Martha? -No, you may not.
Okay, Jack, there's two types of people in this world.
translation.zh: 世上有两类人 思想者

translation.en: There's thinkers, there's doers.
translation.zh: 世上有两类人 思想者 和行动者

translation.en: There's winners, there's dreamers, and there's buddies.
translation.zh: 还有胜利者 梦想者和朋友

translation.en: What about some weaknesses?
[scoffs] I don't...
You have a very trustworthy face. You remind me of, like, an Asian Colonel Sanders.
translation.zh:
你长着一张诚实可靠的脸
像亚裔人里的肯德基大叔

translation.en: A man I can trust.
[Judy] He's a millennial. That means they're the, you know, like lost generation.
translation.zh: 他是80后的一代人 也是迷失的一代

translation.en: Why was the FBI looking for you?
translation.zh: 联邦调查局为什么找你？

translation.en: The what?
Yeah, FBI. Good of you to flag that.
It was during all that alien craziness when you were 14.
translation.zh: 就是在你14岁时发生的外星人事件

translation.en: I mean, they were very kind to me, found me in a jiffy.
And that's all been expunged. Obama gave me a medal, actually.
translation.zh: 我都全忘了 总统颁了英勇奖牌给我

translation.en: I'm just saying. It's always good to have a medal guy in the office, with a medal.
translation.zh: 办公室有人得过奖章总是好事

translation.en: -From Obama? -Yeah.
In this office, we're mostly Republicans, so...
translation.zh: 公司的员工多半是共和党员 因此…

translation.en: I'm not feeling too good. -No? -No.
Why don't you get a little dipping tray and dip the dog in Pepto? That's a solution.
translation.zh: 在热狗上沾点胃药就好了

translation.en: Pow. I got another one. We got to go.
translation.zh: 还有一个面试 我们走！

translation.en: -Come on. -Really?
Sit.
Got myself a Mr. Sam Witwicky, recent college graduate.
translation.zh: 山姆维基 刚毕业的大学生

translation.en: Previous experience, next to zero,
yet he has a recommend letter from our board?
translation.zh: 却有一封董事局的推荐信

translation.en: WTF to that.
Do I know somebody on your board?
translation.zh:
-我认识你们董事会成员吗？
-这样办吧

translation.en: Here's the deal. You know who we are. Accuretta Systems, global leader in telecom,
translation.zh: 你知道我们公司的大名 艾克塔系统

translation.en: aerospace, 17 billion in profit last year.
translation.zh:
全球的电信航天公司龙头
去年盈利170亿美元

translation.en: We contract for DARPA, NASA, JPL, you name it.
translation.zh: 我们的客户包括太空总署等等

translation.en: You perform here, doors open for you anywhere.
translation.zh: 你表现突出的话 前途无量

translation.en: First job out of college is critical, kid.
translation.zh:
孩子 迈出校门的
第一份工作至关重要

translation.en: You either take a step down the correct career path,
translation.zh: 你若选对职业必定步步登高

translation.en: -or you fall into a life-sucking abyss. -Hmm.
So, it all depends on how you respond to my next two words:
translation.zh:
你对我接下来的话有什么
反应就将决定这一切

translation.en: Impress me.
-Now? -Impress me.
You catch me off guard. -I don't know where to begin. -Impress me.
I'm an open book. Ask me any question you like.
-So you're a go-getter, ramrod... -Yes, sir. ...take-charge kind of guy?
translation.zh: 那你是那种志在必得总揽全局的人

translation.en: I'm a killer. A stone-cold killer.
translation.zh: 我就像冷酷无情的杀手

translation.en: So, take-charge guy? Take-charge, Viking, barbarian, of course, that's me.
translation.zh:
-总揽全局…
-像维京海盗一样勇往直前

translation.en: Pow! I'm here.
We are not looking for that here.
No brown-nosing. No suck up. No toolery. I--
translation.zh:
不能卑躬屈膝 顺风接屁
或笨头笨脑…

translation.en: [secretary] Yes, Mr. Brazos.
translation.zh: 布拉佐先生 有何吩咐？

translation.en: Why is Shontel using what appears to be a red cup
translation.zh:
尚特为什么拿着
红色楼层用的红色纸杯？

translation.en: from the red floor
-when we are on the yellow floor? -I'm on it.
translation.zh:
我们是在黄色楼层呀 -我马上搞定
-这是明目张胆

translation.en: It is a visual, and, therefore, a visceral betrayal.
translation.zh: 而又发自肺腑的背叛行为

translation.en: Stop it!
Such a dumbass.
-[Brazos] Disgusting! -[whimpers]
Thank you!
It's total anarchy around here.
The e-mail I read said administrative aide?
translation.zh: 阿 那个电邮上说招聘

translation.en: Nope. Mailroom.
translation.zh:
-行政助理
-不对 是派信小弟

translation.en: I'm gonna go.
Do you have any idea how many Ivy League Phi Beta Kappas would kill to--
translation.zh:
你知道有多少长春藤大学毕业
生争着…

translation.en: Mister, I saved your life twice. Okay?
translation.zh: 先生 我救了你两次 知道吗？

translation.en: I can't tell you how, or when, or why,
translation.zh:
我不能说其中的细节
但我做过很重要的事

translation.en: but I have done shit that matters, and I'd just kind of like a job where I matter again.
translation.zh: 所以我要一份能重视我的工作

translation.en: So thank you, but, no, thank you, okay?
translation.zh: 所以多谢盛情 但敬谢不敏

translation.en: You know what I think? You want the job after this job.
But, son, this is the job that's standing in your way.
translation.zh: 但这份工作是你的敲门石

translation.en: And that's why you're gonna be so very, very good at it.
translation.zh: 但这份工作是你的敲门石 所以一定要把这份工作做得特别好

translation.en: 'Cause when I look at you, I see a younger me.
[man, over PA] All arriving Autobots, in par, training and debriefing in 15 minutes.
translation.zh:
新来的博派在15分钟后
进行培训和简报

translation.en: Dino, report to Bay 23.
Sideswipe, Bay 37 for weapons assessment.
translation.zh: 斯韦伯 到37处评估武器

translation.en: [Mearing] Senator, I suggest you remember that when the NSA wants funding, they call me.
translation.zh:
议员先生 当国安局
需要资金时 会找我

translation.en: When the CIA is gonna take out a target, they ask first for my permission.
translation.zh:
当中情局想要除掉
一个目标时 会请示我

translation.en: And when the President wants to know which members of Congress are politically vulnerable
translation.zh: 当总统想了解哪位议员

translation.en: in terms of, let's say, undiscovered criminal conduct,
translation.zh: 因为未曝光的罪行而前途堪虞 他会先问我

translation.en: I'm the number he dials.
[newscaster, on TV] U.S. agencies say they have been monitoring the blast.
translation.zh: 美国当局正在密切关注这起爆炸案

translation.en: But if, in fact, this was a covert military strike, no nation has claimed responsibility.
translation.zh:
如果这是秘密军事行动
目前没有任何国家出面承认

translation.en: CIA is up my ass about this mystery raid in the Middle East.
translation.zh:
中情局为了这次中东的秘密行动缠上
我

translation.en: So, it's time to come clean. Was your unit involved?
translation.zh: 实话实说 你们的人参与了没？

translation.en: Uh, I'm not sure, ma'am.
All right, guys. This is how you do a Decepticon head kill shot.
translation.zh: 这样瞄准头部直接射杀狂派

translation.en: As Director of National Intelligence, I'm a really big fan of intelligent answers.
translation.zh:
身为国家情报局局长
我要确切的情报

translation.en: I can't really tell you definitively. These Autobots are like teenage kids. They like to sneak out of the house every once in a while.
translation.zh:
很难有确切的情报 这些博派就像
青少年 他们有时候会偷偷溜出去

translation.en: Colonel Lennox, are you in command or are you not? Yes, ma'am, I am.
translation.zh:
-上校 你到底是不是指挥官？
-是的 夫人 我是

translation.en: Stop with the "ma'am." Enough with the "ma'am." Do I look like a "ma'am"?
translation.zh: 别叫我夫人 我看起来像夫人吗？

translation.en: No, ma'am. Yes, ma'am. Yes.
translation.zh: 不像 夫人 像 夫人

translation.en: This gun is my perfect invention, Ironhide. Right.
translation.zh: 这把枪是我的完美杰作

translation.en: Oh, good, you're here!
Me name's Que.
translation.zh: 我是克星 希望你们有个答复

translation.en: I do hope you have answers for him. I've never seen him so upset.
translation.zh: 我是克星 希望你们有个答复 我从没见过他如此生气

translation.en: Optimus, you remember Charlotte Mearing?
translation.zh: 我从没见过他如此生气 擎天柱 记得夏洛特密琳吗？

translation.en: Our Director of National Intelligence?
He's in a bad mood. He's not talking to anybody today.
translation.zh: 今天不想跟任何人讲话

translation.en: What is this, the silent treatment?
-We've seen that and this is not that. -Definitely not. This is worse.
Prime! Make something of yourself!
He's pissed.
You lied to us.
Everything humans know of our planet we were told had all been shared.
So why was this found in human possession?
translation.zh: 这玩意为什么会在人类手中？

translation.en: We were in the dark on this, also. It was Director Only clearance at Sector 7 until now.
translation.zh:
我们也被蒙在鼓里
直到现在我才有权知道

translation.en: The bag.
-[whispers] Which bag? -Hermes. Birkin. Green ostrich!
Oh, my God.
This is a secret few men knew, and fewer still remain alive.
translation.zh: 只有极少数人知道这个秘密 知道秘密还活着的人就更少了

translation.en: Allow me to please introduce to you two of NASA's founding mission directors,
translation.zh:
容许我给你介绍两位太空总署行动
主任

translation.en: and astronaut, Dr. Buzz Aldrin, one of the first two men to step foot on the moon.
translation.zh:
以及巴兹艾德林博士
当年首次登陆月球的宇航员之一

translation.en: Sir? Optimus Prime.
From a fellow space traveler, it's a true honor.
translation.zh:
同样身为太空旅行者
见到你真是三生有幸

translation.en: The honor is mine.
Our entire space race of the 1960s,
translation.zh: 我们60年代的太空争霸赛

translation.en: it appears, was in response to an event.
translation.zh: 我们60年代的太空争霸赛 是为了回应一起事件

translation.en: Our astronauts investigated a crashed alien ship.
translation.zh:
我们的航天员调查了一宗
外星飞船坠毁事件

translation.en: No survivors onboard.
We were sworn to secrecy by our commander-in-chief.
This was a mission you will never speak of.
translation.zh: 这一次任务 参与者定要守口如瓶

translation.en: I understand, sir.
A total of 35 people knew the real plan at NASA.
translation.zh:
当时共有35人知道
太空总署的真正的计划

translation.en: Soviets managed to land unmanned probes.
translation.zh: 苏联成功把无人侦察飞行器送上月球

translation.en: Somehow they must have picked up that fuel rod.
translation.zh: 一定是他们拿走那根燃料棒

translation.en: We believe the Russians deduced
translation.zh:
我们认为俄国人算出
燃料棒可以进行核分裂

translation.en: that the rod was a fissionable fuel assembly, believed they had it mastered, and tried to harness it at Chernobyl.
translation.zh:
他们掌握了这门技术
而且在切尔诺贝利核电厂进行实验

translation.en: We landed six missions in all.
translation.zh: 我们总共登陆月球六次

translation.en: We took hundreds of photos and samples.
translation.zh: 拍下数百张照片并采取样本

translation.en: We locked them away forever,
translation.zh: 然后把它们永远封存起来

translation.en: and the moon program was shut down.
Well, did you search the crash vault?
The ship's name was the Ark.
I watched it escape Cybertron myself.
translation.zh: 我亲眼看它逃离了赛博坦星球

translation.en: It was carrying an Autobot technology which would have won us the war
translation.zh:
飞船上面载有能让我们
赢得大战的博派科技

translation.en: and its captain.
Who was its captain?
The great Sentinel Prime, the technology's inventor.
translation.zh: 伟大的御天敌 博派科技的发明者

translation.en: He was commander of the Autobots before me.
translation.zh: 他是前任的博派指挥官

translation.en: It's imperative that I find it before the decepticons learn of its location.
translation.zh:
我必须抢在狂派之前
找到那艘飞船的位置

translation.en: Our Autobot spacecraft has the ability to get there.
translation.zh: 博派飞船有飞往月球的能力

translation.en: And you must pray it's in time.
translation.zh: 你最好保佑我们抢先找到它

translation.en: Hi. I'm here to see Carly Spencer.
Carly!
[Carly] Sorry, just gotta...
-You got the job? -This is crazy.
translation.zh:
-你找到工作了？
-这地方富丽堂皇！

translation.en: -You really got it? -Yes. See, what did I tell you? It's the bunny.
You are so welcome.
Do you like me more? A little bit, yeah.
translation.zh:
-只有一点点
-你说你是馆长助理

translation.en: You said you were his assistant curator, you didn't say the guy owns Space Mountain.
I know. Isn't it beautiful in here? And he's the coolest guy. Ever.
translation.zh: 他是我见过的最酷的一个人

translation.en: Sam.
Dylan Gould.
Hey. A pleasure to meet you.
Pleasure meeting you. Carly's told me a lot about you.
translation.zh: 幸会 卡莉经常提到你

translation.en: Well, vice versa. It's a beautiful building you got. It's like the Starship Enterprise in here.
translation.zh:
彼此彼此 大楼真豪华
这地方就像星舰企业号

translation.en: [chuckles] Thank you very much. It leaks.
translation.zh: 多谢夸奖 就是漏雨

translation.en: Before Carly came to help run the collection, it was just a complete mess.
translation.zh: 卡莉来帮忙之前 这里一团糟

translation.en: But now, the restorations are back on track.
translation.zh: 现在修复工作重上轨道

translation.en: We're going to Pebble Beach this year, and we're gonna get a trophy for that stand right there.
translation.zh: 我们要去圆石滩再赢一樽奖杯

translation.en: You know why? Because this woman right here
translation.zh: 知道为什么吗？因为这位美女是

translation.en: -is my secret weapon. -[Sam] Okay.
Mr. Gould, please, you exaggerate. All I've done is get you organized.
translation.zh: 过奖了 我只是负责组织

translation.en: You've done much more than that, my Duchess.
translation.zh: 你太谦虚了 我的女公爵

translation.en: Nicknames, that's fun.
Yeah. The Duchess.
You know, when I stole her away from the British Embassy,
translation.zh: 当我从英国大使馆把她挖过来时

translation.en: I said, "It's easy to manage a country. Try managing a priceless collection of art."
translation.zh:
我说：“管理无价艺术
收藏不比治国容易”

translation.en: Take a look at this 1939 Delahaye 165 Cabriolet.
translation.zh:
来看这辆1939年的
第莱雅165敞篷车 是法国人设计的

translation.en: Designed by a Frenchman.
Look at the curves. Elegant, isn't it? Beautiful.
translation.zh: 看看它的曲线 很优雅吧？

translation.en: Sensual.
Built to evoke the body of the ideal woman.
translation.zh: 令人浮想起美女的胴体

translation.en: Come on.
My dad had a ten dollar desk and a dream,
translation.zh: 我爸爸只靠一张简陋的桌子和一个梦

translation.en: and he built it into an empire.
translation.zh: 就建立了如今的商业帝国

translation.en: [Sam chuckles] Wow.
[Dylan] We're the largest accounting firm in the U.S.
translation.zh: 我们是全美最大的会计事务所

translation.en: I started up the venture side after he passed. Invest in the future.
translation.zh: 我爸爸去世后我开始转向投资

translation.en: Try and bet on the winners.
translation.zh: 投资未来会成功的公司

translation.en: See, collecting cars helps me keep my sanity.
translation.zh: 收集汽车有助于我保持理智

translation.en: You guys look great.
That was a great day, Mr. Gould.
-I haven't seen that one. -No. Me, neither.
translation.zh:
-我还没看过这一张
-我也没有

translation.en: -[Dylan] Jeans are tight. -[Sam exhales]
Here we go. Here we go. You see that?
translation.zh: 看到没？他在小看我 以车取人

translation.en: Judgment. Judging a man by his car? And you're gonna wave at him while he's judging me?
translation.zh:
-你也向他挥手
-你是怎么了？他是我老板

translation.en: [Carly] What's with you? He's my boss. This job pays for our food, our rent.
translation.zh:
-我们靠这工作吃饭 交房租呢
-我明白

translation.en: [Sam] No, I totally understand. I'm totally fine. I get it. I'm well fed.
And guess what? I'm not your boy toy anymore. I got my big boy pants on. You see them?
translation.zh:
我不再是你的玩具了
我也能养家糊口了

translation.en: In the car. Thank you, Duchess.
translation.zh: 请上车 公爵夫人 谢谢

translation.en: Oh, my God. Are you threatened by him?
translation.zh: 天啊 你被他吓到了吗？

translation.en: Threatened? What am I threatened by? His money? His power? His good looks?
translation.zh:
凭什么吓我？
凭他有钱有权 长得又帅？

translation.en: None of the above. Check!
translation.zh: 以上皆非 看我的吧！

translation.en: God! Your temper tantrums are so sexy. Get in the car, please.
Sam, he's hardly the first man to ever smile at me.
translation.zh: 他又不是第一个讨好我的男人

translation.en: -I think I can handle it. -Hold on, hold on.
It's the smiling back part that gets me. Okay?
translation.zh: 是你对他落花有意叫我心痛

translation.en: No more smiles. Never again. I promise.
-That works for me. -Yeah?
Easy! Easy! You're not gonna get it started that way.
translation.zh:
-放松点！发飙不能发动引擎
-我只是在为发动车做准备

translation.en: Well, I was just getting it ready. I'm about 32% done with my restoration.
Some chrome work, put a spoiler on the back. Done deal.
translation.zh: 装上镀铬轮圈 扰流板

translation.en: You know, Carly's been telling me you've been struggling job-wise.
translation.zh: 卡莉说你工作找得很辛苦

translation.en: Just so you know, I'm on the board for Accuretta Systems, and I put in a call for you.
translation.zh:
顺便提一下 我是艾克塔系统的董事
我向他们推荐了你

translation.en: Let's keep it between us, okay? She's so proud of you.
translation.zh: 别告诉她 她真的以你为荣

translation.en: You're a lucky man.
[Optimus] Xanthium approaching Tranquility Base.
[man 1] You're a go for landing.
Ratchet, let's roll.
[Optimus] We're entering the Ark.
His levels are faint.
He locked himself away to guard the pillars.
translation.zh: 他为了保护能量柱把自己锁死

translation.en: Sentinel.
translation.zh: 御天敌！你要回家了 老朋友

translation.en: [Megatron] All hail Megatron.
[giggling] My master! Yes, master!
Oh, don't be greedy, my fragile ones.
My poor master.
How it pains me to see you so wounded, so weak.
translation.zh:
看到你伤得这么重
这么虚弱 我真心痛

translation.en: Spare me, you gaseous sycophant!
translation.zh: 省省吧 你这个马屁精

translation.en: You know what you are told, which is nothing.
Soundwave reporting, Lord Megatron.
translation.zh: 音波向你报告 威震天

translation.en: And what news from your little assassin?
translation.zh: 你这个小杀手有什么消息？

translation.en: Autobots have taken the bait.
They've discovered the Ark and returned with its cargo.
translation.zh: 他们发现方舟号 把它运回来

translation.en: You did me great honor tracking that ship to the moon.
translation.zh: 你追踪那艘船到月球 真替我争光

translation.en: Your human collaborators have served their purpose, Soundwave.
translation.zh: 你的人类同伙已失去了利用价值

translation.en: It's time to eliminate loose ends.
translation.zh: 是时候把他们全都消灭掉了

translation.en: [Soundwave] Laserbeak, kill them all.
translation.zh: 激光鸟 把他们全都杀死

translation.en: [Laserbeak] With pleasure.
Is your daddy home?
-[girl] "Then Madeline said..." -[woman] Madeline!
Hello, Mom.
What are you doing in my house? [Laserbeak] Just visiting.
translation.zh:
-你跑我家来干什么？
-我来看你们

translation.en: What is this hoochie-mama outfit?
No, this is the aerospace division, okay? We do not allow that here!
New guy! You see that? That's a Latin meltdown, okay?
You ever show up in my office with a hoochie-mama outfit, you're fired.
translation.zh: 你穿得太花哨就会被炒鱿鱼

translation.en: You got that? Okay, you're gonna be on this cart for two-and-a-half years, okay?
translation.zh: 这台手推车会陪你两年半

translation.en: I want you to live it, love it, and name it.
translation.zh: 你吃饭睡觉都要和它在一起

translation.en: There's no ladder-climbing in my office. I run a tight ship. Okay?
translation.zh:
待在这里别想飞黄腾达
我对属下管束很严

translation.en: -Yes, sir. -Move!
I found that paper I was telling you about.
translation.zh: 我找到了我说的那份报纸

translation.en: -What are we looking at? -Shut up!
translation.zh: 我们在看什么？ 闭嘴！

translation.en: You do that to me again, and I'll kick your ass!
translation.zh: 你敢再对我无礼 我就痛扁你！

translation.en: -Hi. -[chuckles] Hi, angel.
-How are you? -Good.
I had a meeting downtown. Was it okay for me to stop by?
translation.zh: 我在市区开会 顺路来看你 好吗？

translation.en: I don't know. My 500-page employee conduct manual isn't exactly a page turner.
translation.zh: 不知道 员工手册厚到看不完

translation.en: This is great.
Yeah, Autobots are off saving the world, and I have organized four binders. I'm living the dream. Come on.
translation.zh: 我是送信打杂 这回梦想成真了

translation.en: Visitor violation.
You okay? Absolutely.
I'm next.
Listen. Saturday. Dylan's throwing a party at his house. It's a work thing, but he's invited you, too.
translation.zh:
周六迪伦在家搞了个聚会
那算是工作吧

translation.en: -Oh, did he? -I want you to come and laugh at my bad jokes.
translation.zh:
-但他也邀请你了
-是吗？ 来听我的不好笑的笑话 我会很开心

translation.en: It would really mean a lot to me, okay?
translation.zh: 来听我的不好笑的笑话 我会很开心

translation.en: I'd love to go. How'd you get over here?
translation.zh: 盛情难却 你是怎么来的？

translation.en: -Car. -You don't have a car.
Yes, I do.
What, did you win it in a raffle?
Uh, he gave me one.
translation.zh:
-他送了我一辆车
-他送了你一辆车？

translation.en: He gave you a car? Yeah, I think it was a work perk.
translation.zh:
-这算是员工福利吧
-员工福利

translation.en: Huh. A work perk.
translation.zh: 他给你的是一辆什么车？

translation.en: What kind of car did he give you? -A Mercedes SLS AMG. -Mm-hmm. [typing]
Really throaty engine.
[woman] Mercedes-Benz SLS
-combines breathtaking performance... -You drove this here? [sighs]
That's a $200,000 car.
[whispering] I know.
You know how long it would take me to afford a car like this?
translation.zh: 你知道我要多久才买得起？

translation.en: -A long time? -Yeah, like 53 years.
translation.zh:
要很久吗？ -53年
-他说是送我们俩的

translation.en: Then what we should do is, we should sell it and buy a house.
You're frustrated, I know. I've been there.
translation.zh: 你心里不平衡 我懂 这就叫一份耕耘 一份收获

translation.en: It's called paying your dues. Good things will happen.
translation.zh: 这就叫一份耕耘 一份收获

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, I need some lunch time filing done, stat.
translation.zh: 大伙听着 午餐时间赶点急活

translation.en: Who would like to score some Bruce Brazos points?
translation.zh: 谁想提高布鲁斯信任指数？

translation.en: Bruce, you found your guy.
translation.zh: 布鲁斯 有合适人选了

translation.en: Witwicky!
The man who makes this company run.
Now, who have we here?
Is it a sister, Facebook friend, Twitter tweeter?
-Carly, this is Bruce. Bruce. -Hi.
I'm his girlfriend. A pleasure to meet you. Sam was right. You really do have a smashing head of hair.
translation.zh: 山姆说的没错 您的发型真的很酷哎

translation.en: Well, thank you.
-Sam, I got to run. -Yeah.
Here, your present.
Your favorite color.
-Nice to meet you, Mr. Brazos. -And you.
translation.zh:
-很高兴认识你 布拉佐先生
-彼此彼此

translation.en: See you, boys.
I'm still stewing about that binder incident, Jerry.
translation.zh:
杰瑞 打掉我的文件
我对此还耿耿于怀

translation.en: May I finish my Shuhua milk, Donny?
translation.zh: 先让我喝完牛奶 好吗？唐尼

translation.en: I don't care about your exotic milk. I care about respect!
translation.zh: 少来这一套 我要的是尊敬

translation.en: I know who you are!
Witwicky! Witwicky!
-I'm talking to you! -Excuse me. Thank you.
translation.zh: 我在跟你讲话！ 让下 谢谢

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa. Slow down, tiger.
You showed up in the background of six different photos, two continents, with aliens.
translation.zh: 我见过6张你和外星人在一起的照片

translation.en: That was you in Egypt, huh, right? Because you know the aliens. See you!
translation.zh:
你当时在埃及 对吧？
你认识那些外星人 再见！

translation.en: Give me my jacket!
I'm Wang. Deep Wang. Deep Wang.
You're not getting it. Deep Throat.
translation.zh: 你不明白啊 深喉密探呀

translation.en: Watergate? I'm talking code to you... Shh! Damn it.
Shh!
They watch and listen.
I can't go to the government, but you can.
translation.zh:
我不能去找政府 但是你能！
事情搞砸了！

translation.en: Because shit's going down, son! It is Code Pink, as in Floyd.
Dark Side. Why do you think no one's been up there since 1972?
I know you're speaking English, I just...
translation.zh: 我知道你在说英文 但我听不懂

translation.en: It's a very strange English. That's why I'm not--
translation.zh: 我知道你在说英文 但我听不懂 所以我才不是...

translation.en: Don't. I'm gonna hit you.
I'm gonna hit you right back, son.
It's my manifesto.
They're whacking us out, everyone who knows what's on the dark--
translation.zh: 他们正在把知情的人一个个杀死

translation.en: Your alien friends are in danger, you know, the good ones. It's up to you.
translation.zh:
你的外星人朋友有危险
好的外星人 他们要靠你了

translation.en: [Jerry] Calm down.
Easy, Sam!
What are you looking at?
Yo, dawg.
Are you up in my shit? Who are you working for?
Staredown, you and me.
translation.zh: 你的主子是谁？互瞪比赛 你和我

translation.en: Guess I won.
Moon satellites.
The Russian space program.
Experts dead.
Space program ends.
translation.zh: 太空计划终止 黑暗的一面

translation.en: Dark side... Dark side of the moon.
Look what I found outside the bathroom. Is it yours?
translation.zh: 我在洗手间外面捡到的 你的吗？

translation.en: Deal with this. Yes, sir.
I did everything you want!
I really think we should talk, 'cause some of the stuff--
Whoa! Knock first!
Can't you see I'm busy? Who are you? Who are you?
You straddled me in the stall.
That's happened to me once in this life. I wouldn't forget it.
translation.zh: 这种事只发生过一次 我忘不了

translation.en: -I don't know. -From the bathroom stall. You took your package out.
translation.zh: 你在厕所里把东西掏出来

translation.en: -Whoa! -You took your package out. We are not boyfriends, okay?
translation.zh: 打住！我们不是同志 懂吗？

translation.en: One phone call from me and I'll have you fired. Oh, yes, I will, gaylord!
translation.zh: 我打一个电话你就会被炒鱿鱼

translation.en: -[Jerry screaming] -Are you okay?
Hemorrhoids!
Should I come back? When should I come back?
Come back when you learn some manners!
I don't know him! I would never say anything!
translation.zh: 我不认识他！我会一直守口如瓶！

translation.en: Okay, okay! I sabotaged the mapping satellite, just like I promised, I can put a blind spot in the program as a bonus.
translation.zh: 我依计破坏了人造定位卫星

translation.en: What more do you want from me?
Jerry, you are my favorite.
translation.zh: 杰瑞 我一向都最喜欢你

translation.en: I'll do whatever you want me to do.
I know, but my superiors need me to...
translation.zh: 我知道 但我的上司要我…

translation.en: ...suicide you.
translation.zh:
-求你了 别杀我
-让你自杀

translation.en: What did you say to Witwicky?
Oh, shit!
Huh? Who wants some chicken dinner now, bitch?
translation.zh: 谁想来点鸡肉饭？兔崽子!

translation.en: 'Cause somebody messed with the wrong Wang today!
translation.zh: 谁想来点鸡肉饭？兔崽子! 有人连天王老子都敢惹！

translation.en: Come on! You want some of me?
No, no, no!
I don't need any more didactic lectures from Chuck.
translation.zh: 我已经听够查克的说教了

translation.en: -[screaming] -Jesus!
[Brazos] Get legal.
That's Jerry!
Come on, people. Yes, a workmate died, but looking out the window is not going to bring him back.
translation.zh:
你们趴窗外看热闹
人也不会起死回生

translation.en: The man was depressed. Don't take a picture!
You can keep watching him, but he's not getting up. You all read "Humpty Dumpty." Okay?
Witwicky. I'm spearheading the press. You clean up.
translation.zh: 维基 我去应付媒体 你负责善后

translation.en: Wang is everywhere. He is in the bistro.
He's in the bamboo. He's on the balustrade.
You see the sidewalk down there? [chuckles] Man!
translation.zh: 你们看到下面的人行道了吗？

translation.en: Box up his personals. Get his name off his parking space.
translation.zh: 替他打包 收回他的停车位

translation.en: [man] Hey, when did we get a new copier?
translation.zh:
-还有一件事
-怎么不去买一个新复印机？

translation.en: Listen, I'm not gonna say anything about what I saw.
translation.zh: 你们的事 我就当一无所知

translation.en: Who you share a toilet stall with is totally your business.
translation.zh: 你跟谁共用一个马桶纯属个人隐私

translation.en: This is exceedingly Japanese.
They never make it easy, do they?
translation.zh: 日本人不知简单为何物

translation.en: [Carly] What is with you? [Sam] This is the real deal, Carly, okay?
translation.zh:
-你怎么了？
-这是大事 要镇定

translation.en: I need you to stay composed. It's real life. I'll explain it to you later.
translation.zh:
-你怎么了？
-这是大事 要镇定 是正经事 回头给你讲

translation.en: We've got an emergency. You gotta get Colonel Lennox out here. I'm reporting a Decepticon. The Decepticons are back. You gotta open that gate right now.
translation.zh: 狂派回来了 快开门

translation.en: Easy, sir. This is Health and Human Services.
translation.zh: 这是卫生及公共服务部

translation.en: Right. Packing M4s? What are you protecting, colostomy bags? -Bedpans? Throat lozenges? -[Carly] Babe...
translation.zh:
干嘛荷枪实弹的？
你要保护尿袋？便盆？还是药片？

translation.en: Where'd you get that hat from, nursing school? So, you're nurses and foot-powder protectors? -Babe. -Fantastic. Yes.
translation.zh: 你们是护士？想保护爽足粉？

translation.en: -I don't think we're in the right place. -We are in the right place.
translation.zh:
-我们来错地方了
-是这里没错

translation.en: We're in the right place, and I'm gonna talk to Optimus right now. -You're gonna get Optimus out here. -Sir.
translation.zh: 我想找擎天柱 叫他出来

translation.en: You got the wrong building. I don't know what you're talking about.
What part of "Decepticons are back" do you not understand?
translation.zh: 狂派回来了 你不明白吗？

translation.en: [bangs car] Yo! You being a smartass?
Do not hit my car! It's a collector's item!
translation.zh: 别打我的车！那是古董车！

translation.en: I wouldn't do that. -[alarm blaring] -[Carly] You're crazy!
-[device beeping] -We got an Energon reading!
We've got aliens in the vehicle!
-[screaming] -You move, you're dead! Out! Out!
translation.zh: 别动 否则杀无赦 出来！

translation.en: -Got aliens in the vehicle! -[screaming]
-Freeze! Get out! -Whoa, whoa, whoa!
Are you kidding me?
[Carly] Sam, they've got guns!
[guard] I got him. Go! Bee! Is Bee in there?
[groans] Okay, all right!
This how you treat Autobots? We're on the same team.
translation.zh: 敢对博派如此无理 我们是一伙的

translation.en: Yeah, enjoy your next job at 7-Eleven, dickhead.
translation.zh: 猪头 准备去站柜台吧

translation.en: -That's right. -A-hole.
How's your car now?
That's my car.
Come here.
Come here! Come on. Sam.
What is your deal, huh?
I know your black ops stuff is important to you. I'm not trying to diminish it or guilt-trip you or anything,
translation.zh:
我知道你得当卧底
我也不想害你内疚 但…

translation.en: I just never see you anymore.
You can't come to the garage and just hang out one night?
translation.zh: 但你怎么都不来陪陪我？

translation.en: Sam. That makes me feel bad.
translation.zh:
-山姆 我为此内疚
-我倒希望你内疚

translation.en: I hope you feel bad. You should feel bad. Look at the jalopy I'm driving now. I feel bad every single day.
translation.zh:
应该这样 看看我的老爷车
我每天都心痛

translation.en: [guard] Yo, let's go, both of you. Lennox wants to see you.
translation.zh: 走吧 蓝尼要见你们

translation.en: What, we not good enough for you anymore?
I'm sorry, babe. They were very rude, all right?
translation.zh: 抱歉 宝贝 他们太粗鲁了

translation.en: And you're fixing my car. You don't think so?
translation.zh: 你要修好我的车 知道吗？

translation.en: [Sam] Raise your hand if you had a flying psycho-ninja copier trying to kill you today!
translation.zh: 被会飞的忍者复印机追杀的人请举手

translation.en: Those are my brass knuckles.
That's my anklet. Do I have to take that off, too? And my toe rings?
translation.zh:
是我的脚环啦 要摘掉吗？
还有脚趾环呢？

translation.en: [man, on PA] All NEST officials clear the floor. We have ten minutes until attempted contact.
translation.zh: 所有人员请退场 十分钟后进行接触

translation.en: [Mearing] We've taken possession of the five devices that were hidden in the ship with Sentinel Prime.
translation.zh: 我们拥有了御天敌藏匿的5个能量柱

translation.en: They're some kind of prototype Autobot technology.
They say Sentinel was the Einstein of his civilization, so we're gonna keep these locked up
translation.zh:
据说御天敌是他们的爱因斯坦
我们得把这些锁起

translation.en: until we know what we're dealing with.
translation.zh: 直到我们搞清它们的原理

translation.en: Right now, no one gets access. No one.
translation.zh: 现在 这里是禁区 任何人都不准进入

translation.en: This Wang guy recognized me. He told me to warn you. He was talking about the dark side of the moon,
translation.zh:
他要我捎信给你 他提到月球
就被灭口了

translation.en: -then they killed him. -Wait a minute. He mentioned the moon?
translation.zh:
他要我捎信给你 他提到月球
就被灭口了 -他提到了月球？
-月球黑暗的一面

translation.en: Yeah, dark side of the moon.
translation.zh:
-他提到了月球？
-月球黑暗的一面

translation.en: But why would Decepticons want to kill humans?
I thought their war was with the Autobots.
translation.zh: 我以为他们只是要和博派开战

translation.en: And that is when he made his first quick-look science report. That's what we want--
translation.zh: 这就是他当时做的初步报告

translation.en: Who's the chick? Okay. Excuse me. Colonel Lennox?
translation.zh: 那小妞是谁？ 打扰一下！蓝尼上校

translation.en: Director Mearing, this is Sam Witwicky...
translation.zh: 局长 这是山姆维基

translation.en: I know his name, Colonel. I wanna know who gave him clearance?
translation.zh:
-我知道他是谁 谁放他进来的？
-是擎天柱

translation.en: Who gave me clearance? How about Optimus Prime, when he touched down in suburbia looking for my house?
translation.zh: 他去过我家 有问题吗？

translation.en: This is the National Intelligence Director. In case you...
translation.zh: 这位是国家情报局局长 如果你…

translation.en: -Hi. -Disrespecting a federal officer? Huh.
translation.zh: 你好 冒犯联邦官员会让你惹麻烦

translation.en: Maybe that'll get you somewhere. Who's she?
translation.zh: 冒犯联邦官员会让你惹麻烦

translation.en: -She's my girlfriend. -What is this, like, a date?
translation.zh:
-她是谁？
-我女友 你们来这里约会？

translation.en: She knows all about the Autobots, okay? She knows Bumblebee.
translation.zh: 她知道博派的事 也知道大黄蜂

translation.en: And she comes from a military family. I can vouch for her.
translation.zh: 她来自军人家庭 我能替她作保

translation.en: Hey, I have an idea. How about we get back to the important topics,
like the fact that I almost had my face cut off by a Decepticon?
As a taxpayer, I'd like to lodge a complaint, as a matter of fact.
translation.zh: 身为纳税人 我要投诉

translation.en: Okay, listen, all right? One of the software engineers at Sam's office was murdered today.
translation.zh: 山姆的公司有位软件工程师被杀

translation.en: He was involved in NASA's lunar mapping probe.
translation.zh: 他参与了NASA的月球测绘探测器项目

translation.en: Here's the thing, Colonel Lennox.
translation.zh: 问题是这样的 蓝尼上校

translation.en: We cannot entrust national security to teenagers
translation.zh: 绝不能把国家安全机密告诉青少年

translation.en: unless I missed a policy paper. Are we doing that now? No. Good.
translation.zh:
除非我没看过规定
我们现在有那样做吗？

translation.en: I don't care who you are.
If you breathe a word of what you see in here, you will do time for treason. Do you understand me?
translation.zh: 就等着坐牢吧 明白吗？

translation.en: I'll take my orders from the Autobots. I know them. I don't know you.
translation.zh: 我只听博派的话 我不认识你

translation.en: You will.
[Lennox] Sentinel Prime.
These things run on Energon, and he's out of it.
translation.zh:
他们得靠超能量
而他的超能量已用尽

translation.en: He's in a sort of a sleep mode.
translation.zh:
他们得靠超能量
而他的超能量已用尽 休眠状态

translation.en: [Optimus] Let us begin.
That's the great Matrix of Leadership.
He holds the only thing in the universe that can repower a Transformer's spark.
translation.zh: 唯一能够激活变形金刚的东西

translation.en: This is incredible.
Sentinel Prime...
we bid you return.
Hold your fire!
Stop! Sentinel!
It is I, Optimus Prime!
It is all right. You are safe.
There is nothing to fear.
We are here.
You are home, Sentinel.
The war... The war!
[Optimus] The war was lost.
Cybertron is now but a barren wasteland.
translation.zh: 赛博坦现在变成一片荒原

translation.en: We have taken refuge here, on planet Earth.
translation.zh: 我们在地球找到了庇护所

translation.en: Its human race is our ally.
My ship. We came under fire.
translation.zh: 我的飞船 我们被击中

translation.en: The pillars. Where are the pillars?
You saved five of them, including the control pillar.
translation.zh: 你救出了五根 包括主控柱

translation.en: Only five? We once had hundreds!
translation.zh: 只有五根？我们曾经有数百根！

translation.en: [Mearing] Excuse me, gentlemen. May I ask, what is this technology you're looking for?
translation.zh: 你们在找的科技是什么？

translation.en: [Sentinel] It is the ability to reshape the universe.
translation.zh: 那是一种重塑宇宙的能力

translation.en: Together, the pillars form a space bridge.
translation.zh: 能量柱组合形成太空桥

translation.en: I designed, and I alone, can control it.
translation.zh: 是我设计的 只有我能掌控它

translation.en: It defies your laws of physics to transport matter through time and space.
translation.zh: 它违反地球物质穿越时空的物理定律

translation.en: You're talking about a teleportation device, aren't you?
translation.zh: 你指的是瞬间移动的机器

translation.en: Yes, for resources, for refugees.
translation.zh: 对 为了运送物资或难民

translation.en: Refugees, or troops of soldiers, weapons, maybe bombs!
translation.zh: 难民或是军队 士兵 武器或炸弹

translation.en: A means of an instant strike! That's its military function, isn't it?
translation.zh:
还可以闪电攻击
都是军事用途 是吗？

translation.en: It is our technology, and it must be returned.
translation.zh: 这是我们的科技 必须还给我们

translation.en: Yes. If humans say so.
You can't just bring weapons of mass destruction into our atmosphere!
translation.zh: 你不能把大规模杀伤武器带来！

translation.en: You kind of have to clear customs first!
A little formality called paperwork, kind of separates us from the animals.
translation.zh: 这是手续 也是我们和动物的区别

translation.en: I will overlook your condescending tone
if you heed the gravity of mine.
translation.zh: 我就不计较你跟我摆架子

translation.en: The Decepticons must never know the space bridge is here. For in their hands,
translation.zh: 狂派不能知道太空桥在这里…否则

translation.en: it would mean the end of your world.
translation.zh: 你们的世界末日就到了

translation.en: "Total Nightmare" file.
So, the investigation is open. We've sent agents to your office.
translation.zh: 我们会派探员到你的公司展开调查

translation.en: And, for the time being, we're gonna send you home with Autobot protection.
Who do I need to speak to to get you guys to understand that I can help, that I can contribute?
translation.zh: 谁才能使你相信我能帮上忙呢？

translation.en: Hey, we can all help. Want to tell you what I know? I could tell you about the solar system, all the fun planets to hang out in.
translation.zh: 我对太阳系很熟 知道哪个星球好玩

translation.en: Get off my desk, please.
You pulling out guns? I can't help you out now. She angry.
translation.zh: 我现在无能为力了 她居然火了

translation.en: Oh, my God.
What do you envision for me? I go home now? I go back to work? I make copies? I mean...
translation.zh: 让我回家或回公司继续跑腿打杂？

translation.en: This is a unit for veteran intelligence officers and Special Forces,
translation.zh: 这里都是资深特工和特种部队…

translation.en: not for boys who once owned special cars.
translation.zh: 不适合有过特别跑车的小孩

translation.en: That's a bit harsh, isn't it, ma'am?
translation.zh: 你的话有点过份 夫人

translation.en: Don't call me ma'am. I'm not a ma'am.
translation.zh: 别叫我夫人 我不是夫人

translation.en: Well, you're a woman, aren't you?
So... are those yours?
translation.zh:
所以… -…那些都是你的奖章？
-对

translation.en: Yeah. CIA.
I only ask 'cause I also have a medal, from the President.
translation.zh:
这样问是因为我也有
一枚奖章 总统颁发的

translation.en: Yeah. Great. So, it's not that complicated, right? No one gets to work with the Autobots unless I approve it.
translation.zh:
好啊 听好 没有我的批准
谁都不准联系博派战士

translation.en: You're breaking my chain of command.
Come on, let's go. You've done what you came for.
translation.zh: 走吧 你做了你该做的

translation.en: With all due respect, young man, I appreciate what you did.
translation.zh: 年轻人 我很感谢你做的一切

translation.en: But you're not a soldier.
translation.zh: 你不是军人 你只是一个送信的

translation.en: You're a messenger. You've always been a messenger.
translation.zh: 你不是军人 你只是一个送信的 你一直都只是个送信的

translation.en: He's a hero.
Bee, you take the freight elevator. I'll see you up there.
translation.zh: 大黄蜂 你坐货运电梯

translation.en: This blows. That lady officially kicked us out.
translation.zh: 可恶 那个婆娘把我们赶了出来

translation.en: Yeah. Witness Protection Program sucks.
translation.zh: 保护证人计划一塌糊涂

translation.en: Yeah, but we're a whole lot safer with big yellow and his cannons.
translation.zh: 至少大黄蜂在 我们比较安全

translation.en: That dog can't protect crap.
[Sam] Bee?
You miss hanging out?
Yeah, me too.
That woman, she called me a messenger. Can you believe that? After everything I've done, I'm a messenger.
translation.zh: 我出生入死 那个婆娘却叫我送信的

translation.en: I believe it. I tell you, Sammy, we feel the same way.
translation.zh: 山姆 我们也替你不值

translation.en: The disrespect on this rock is criminal.
translation.zh: 这种大不敬是简直岂有此理

translation.en: We should do something about it.
Bee, I need to know why they're killing humans.
translation.zh: 大黄蜂 我们应该去找专家

translation.en: I say we call in the expert.
[O'Reilly] My next guest is a former American intelligence operative who has dared to speak out
translation.zh:
下一位来宾过去曾是情报员
只有他敢直言...

translation.en: regarding our alleged military alliance with what many describe
as a group of extraterrestrial mercenaries.
He is the author of the bestselling book, Code-Name Hero.
translation.zh: 他就是畅销书《代号英雄》的作者

translation.en: Former special agent, Seymour Simmons.
translation.zh: 前特工 西蒙西蒙斯

translation.en: Bill. Big fan. Great to be here.
translation.zh:
比尔 我是你的忠实粉丝
很高兴跟大家见面

translation.en: Now, Agent Simmons, you would have us believe that it is in our best interest
translation.zh: 你相信和内战中的外星人一方结盟

translation.en: to formally take sides in this so-called alien civil war?
translation.zh: 真的对我们的国家有利吗？

translation.en: Well, the other side wanted to spank us for breakfast,
so I wouldn't exactly call it a toss-up.
translation.zh: 这种事可不能仅凭天意

translation.en: These Decepticons are lethal.
But polls show half the world would feel safer with the Autobots completely gone.
translation.zh: 但民调显示一半的世人认为

translation.en: Get them out of here! We don't need them here!
translation.zh: 让他们走人！他们不受欢迎!

translation.en: I feel safer when I sleep with a hand grenade.
translation.zh: 拿着手榴弹睡觉才真正能给人安全感

translation.en: Doesn't mean I'm always right.
translation.zh: 但也不表示我说的就一定对

translation.en: Now, agent, here at The Factor, we have obtained documents
translation.zh: 探员 今天通过本节目中向大家披露

translation.en: that show you were fired...
translation.zh: 文件显示你已经被开除了...

translation.en: -Chaz, I'm doing an interview. -Sorry, Mr. Simmons.
Downsized, Bill. -Budget cuts. Chaz, out. -Your psych evaluation reports
translation.zh:
-抱歉 西蒙斯先生
-精简机构 压缩预算

translation.en: "severe delusional tendencies."
This is ambush journalism.
You want the truth about the alien alliance?
Buy my book! Buy my book before it's too late, people!
translation.zh: 买我的书！不然就来不及了！

translation.en: You want a piece of me, Bill? -You want to get naked? I'm ready! -Wow.
translation.zh: 比尔 你想单挑我随时奉陪

translation.en: Interview is over! You! -You're sounding like a pinhead, agent. -Out of my house! -And I've got a suggestion for you. -It's over. Understand?
translation.zh:
-采访结束 滚出去
-你这个猪头

translation.en: -Damage control. -[Simmons] Dutch!
You have obviously upset Mr. Simmons!
You have 23 seconds to leave the property. I have called the police!
translation.zh: 23秒内消失 不然我就要报警！

translation.en: You are peasant people throwing rocks at a giant!
translation.zh: 无知的乡巴佬 不知进退

translation.en: What's up next? What have we got?
translation.zh:
-接下来做什么？
-中午举行签售会

translation.en: Book signing, Midtown, noon. Then we pitch your reality show to the Discovery Channel.
translation.zh: 然后商谈新的电视节目

translation.en: And I have this Witwicky who keeps calling me.
translation.zh: 对了 维基一直给我打电话

translation.en: Kid? What does he want?
I called you because the Decepticons are back. I want to know why, and I need your help.
They're back?
translation.zh:
-请你帮忙查查原因
-他们回来了？

translation.en: Well, that's good for business.
What if I told you I know a 50-year-old alien secret that nobody ever told you?
translation.zh: 我知道一个50年前的外星人秘密

translation.en: Do not tempt my addiction.
I have gone through withdrawal, kid.
translation.zh: 孩子 我已经金盆洗手了

translation.en: -Dutch, is this line secure? -No.
translation.zh:
-达奇 这电话有人监听吗？
-是的

translation.en: Don't take the risk. I'm rich, why should I?
translation.zh: 别冒险 我有钱 犯不着冒险

translation.en: Do not relapse. I won't.
translation.zh: 别再犯瘾 我不会的

translation.en: Do not let the demons win.
Got it.
What kind of secret?
Apollo. Moon. Aliens. Cover-up.
translation.zh: 阿波罗号 月球 外星人 掩盖真相

translation.en: Future tech. Assassinations. That kind of stuff.
translation.zh: 未来科技 暗杀之类的

translation.en: [sighs] Apollo.
Dutch!
Tell Megatron, "Let's tango."
So majestic and peaceful, this planet.
translation.zh: 地球是如此壮观和祥和

translation.en: Unlike the final days of Cybertron.
I've wondered what might have been
if you had fought the final battle, instead of me.
Never mourn the past, young warrior.
translation.zh: 世上无后悔药 年轻的勇士

translation.en: Thanks to you, our race survives.
translation.zh: 多亏有你 我们的种族才能存活

translation.en: You were our leader, Sentinel.
It is your right to lead us again.
translation.zh: 再当领袖 你当之无愧

translation.en: In a world I do not know,
I am no longer your teacher, Optimus. You are mine.
translation.zh: 我不再是你的导师 擎天柱 你是我的了

translation.en: You've got to break this case down.
translation.zh: 咱们得把这件事查个水落石出

translation.en: What we have here is an astronaut epidemic.
translation.zh: 宇航员们好像劫数难逃

translation.en: MIA. Dead. Died in a car accident. Killed. DOA. Car death.
translation.zh:
失踪 挂掉 死于车祸
被杀 抢救无效

translation.en: It's like these guys can't drive. They can fly into outer space, but they can't drive a car.
translation.zh:
好像他们能驾驶宇宙飞船
却不会开车

translation.en: Procured your information, Witwicky. Thank you, Bruce.
translation.zh:
-维基 我拿到你的资料
-谢了 布鲁斯

translation.en: Now...
let me see one right now. One time.
translation.zh: 让我见一个 就一次

translation.en: -Quick. -Very.
Lunar Reconnaissance Orbiter.
It says NASA launched it in 2009.
See, forensics show Wang may have messed with the code, preventing it from mapping the far side of the moon, which is also the dark side.
translation.zh: 调查显示王可能破坏了代码

translation.en: Fucking awesome.
They infiltrate us, intimidate us, coerce us to do their dirty work. And once they're done...
translation.zh:
这些人被逼迫替狂派干肮脏事
一旦干完

translation.en: ...a double-tap to the cerebellum.
So humans are working for the Decepticons.
I don't think this is about the Decepticons looking for something on the moon.
translation.zh: 我不认为狂派想在月球寻找什么东西

translation.en: I think it's about something they wanted to hide.
translation.zh: 他们是想隐藏什么东西

translation.en: Come to daddy.
Come on, throw down.
[Bumblebee] Did you eat a lot of paint chips when you were a kid?
translation.zh: 你小时候脑子灌水了吗？

translation.en: He's a freak.
-Like it? -Get back!
Sir! We are having a pretty high-level alien intel confab here
translation.zh:
先生 这是高层会议
我们在分析外星人情报

translation.en: that I don't think you're cleared for, errand boy.
Yeah, you're right. It's a bitching robot.
translation.zh:
-打杂的
-有道理 -爱翻脸的机器人
-走吧 布鲁斯

translation.en: [Sam] I think it's time to go, Bruce.
translation.zh:
-爱翻脸的机器人
-走吧 布鲁斯

translation.en: Thank you so much for this. And-- Got to go, Bruce.
translation.zh:
-多谢你让我大开眼界
-布鲁斯 快走

translation.en: I'm smoking over here. Downloading missing Russian cosmonauts.
translation.zh: 找到失踪的苏联宇航员的资料了

translation.en: Turns out the Soviets canceled a manned mission to the moon.
The moon, in 1972.
And two of their cosmonauts went into hiding in America.
translation.zh: 后来有两名宇航员逃到美国

translation.en: And I just found them alive.
translation.zh: 我刚刚才知道他们还活着

translation.en: [Wheelie] You're a genius, Brains.
[Brains] Oh, that was smooth, Bumblebee.
Missed it by that much.
Hi.
Would somebody care to tell me what the hell's going on?
-Who are you? -Who are you?
Who am I? Who is that? Dutch! Frisk her!
Certainly.
No. Dutch. Don't touch me.
-I'm not gonna touch her. -Sam?
Angel.
Uh, I was working. I'm sorry about this.
[Wheelie] Great. We're homeless. She lives here? Wow.
translation.zh:
-太好了 我们会被逐出家门
-她住在这里？哇

translation.en: You had your chance to frisk her.
I have a girlfriend. Really? What's her name?
India.
We're supposed to be at Dylan's party, remember?
translation.zh: 我们应该去迪伦的聚会

translation.en: I do remember, but these are my friends. They need me. I have to be here right now.
translation.zh: 我知道 但朋友需要我

translation.en: So, what, the Autobots and the military, they can't handle this on their own?
translation.zh: 博派和军方他们自己搞不定吗？

translation.en: You know what I liked about your war stories, Sam?
translation.zh: 我很喜欢听你的英勇事迹

translation.en: It's that they were stories, they were in the past.
translation.zh:
是因为那些只是故事
而且都已经过去了

translation.en: [Sam] Look, I know you're thinking about your brother, okay? And you're thinking about your family. And it's not that situation.
translation.zh: 我知道你要为你弟弟做打算

translation.en: -No? -No.
Why not? Why isn't it, Sam?
You think we'd rather have his medals, or we'd rather have him?
translation.zh:
你认为我们宁可要奖章
还是要他活着？

translation.en: I hear you. I get it. Where are you taking my bunny? Stop!
translation.zh:
我懂了
你要把幸运兔拿去哪？站住！

translation.en: Just stop for a second.
You think I could sleep last night? And then it hit me. No, Sam wants to be in danger.
translation.zh:
我一晚上没睡觉
你知道吗？我恍然大悟

translation.en: -He doesn't know who he is without it. -I just want to matter.
translation.zh:
我一晚上没睡觉
你知道吗？我恍然大悟 -他不清楚自己是谁
-我只想被重视

translation.en: You matter to me.
I know you're worried. I know you're worried. But I promise you, I can handle this.
translation.zh:
我知道你担心我
但我保证我不会有事

translation.en: Can you? You can promise it?
I promise.
Sam, I don't want to lose you, and I know where this leads.
translation.zh:
我不想失去你
我知道这样下去的结局

translation.en: I'm not ready for this.
-Are you coming with me? -I can't.
Okay.
Hey.
Here's your foot.
The warrior's path is a solitary one.
How the hell did she afford that car?
Her boss. Rich bastards!
I used to hate them. Now, it's...
translation.zh: 我一向很讨厌他们 但现在...

translation.en: [Simmons] Going to a gig on the hunt for two Russian cosmonauts.
translation.zh: 咱们要去找两名神秘苏联宇航员

translation.en: Nothing like driving in a Maybach, huh?
Germans know how to make cars, let me tell you.
My Dutchman, former NSA cybersleuth extraordinaire,
translation.zh: 达奇曾是国安局的网络专家

translation.en: tracked them down here.
So, these cosmonauts went into hiding. Why?
translation.zh:
-他们俩为何要逃到美国？
-妙极

translation.en: Bingo. I got a match.
You're a German Shepherd, Dutch.
translation.zh: 你就像一只德国狼犬 达奇

translation.en: [Simmons] The thing about Russians is, they never like to talk.
translation.zh: 俄国人从来不肯说实话

translation.en: It's gonna take a little of the "international language."
-Do svidaniya. -That means "goodbye."
[mumbles] Watch this.
Dutch, give me something tough.
Baryshnikov.
We do speak English.
translation.zh:
-我们会说英文
-达奇 你太逊了

translation.en: It's a Cyrillic alphabet.
It's like all the buttons you never push on a calculator!
[Dutch] I don't suck.
Agent Seymour Simmons, Sector Eight, formerly Seven.
translation.zh:
我是第8区的西蒙斯探员
以前是7区的

translation.en: We know who you are, cosmonautchiks.
translation.zh: 我们知道你们的身份 宇航员

translation.en: So what?
You were supposed to travel to the dark side of the moon,
then it all got shut down.
translation.zh: 飞到月球黑暗的一面 后来计划被取消了

translation.en: The question is, why?
"Can my child smoke in here?"
translation.zh: 我的小孩能在这儿抽烟吗？

translation.en: Okay, all right. Okay.
-Go ahead, shoot me. -[speaking Russian]
I'm willing to die for my country. Are you?
translation.zh: 我愿意为国捐躯 你呢？

translation.en: -[Simmons] Really? -[shouts in Russian]
You are beautiful. Has anyone ever told you you're beautiful? She's a beautiful woman.
translation.zh: 你很美 有人告诉过你吗？

translation.en: Dutch! Back in the cage.
[imitates Dutch accent] Dutch! Hold, Dutch, hold!
Control your boy, please. Control your boy.
translation.zh: 拜托管好你的手下 叫他别乱来！

translation.en: Dutch, stop!
translation.zh: 拜托管好你的手下 叫他别乱来！ 达奇！快住手！

translation.en: I'm so sorry. That is the old me.
translation.zh: 非常抱歉 那是以前的我

translation.en: Okay, let's everybody just calm down!
Let's lower the heat, lower the guns.
translation.zh: 大家消消火 把枪放下

translation.en: Let's relax. World War II is over.
translation.zh: 大家消消火 把枪放下 二战已经结束了

translation.en: [Dimitri] You are about to see one of the biggest Soviet secrets.
translation.zh: 你们即将看到苏联的一个惊天机密

translation.en: America first to send man to the moon.
translation.zh: 美国首先把人送上月球

translation.en: But USSR first to send camera.
translation.zh: 但苏联是第一个把摄影机送上月球的

translation.en: In 1959, our Luna 3
take picture of the dark, the shadow side.
translation.zh: 拍下月球黑暗那一面的照片

translation.en: Sees nothing.
But in 1963, Luna 4 sees--
translation.zh:
-但在1963年 月球4号看到了...
-一些奇怪的石头

translation.en: Strange rocks. Yeah. Around the ship. Hundreds of them.
Yeah, show picture.
translation.zh:
-有好几百块呢
-给他们看照片

translation.en: With some drag marks.
[Sam] I've seen these. These aren't rocks, these are pillars. Alien pillars for a space bridge.
translation.zh:
我看过这些 它们是外星能量柱
能组成太空桥

translation.en: We know about them because the Autobots have five of these.
The Decepticons must have raided
the ship before Apollo 11 ever got there,
translation.zh:
比阿波罗11号先到一步
拿走能量柱...

translation.en: took the pillars, and hid them.
translation.zh:
比阿波罗11号先到一步
拿走能量柱... -并藏了起来
-这没道理啊

translation.en: It doesn't make sense.
The Decepticons have the ship. They have all those pillars.
translation.zh:
狂派控制了飞船
拿走了所有的能量柱

translation.en: Why would they leave Sentinel when he's the only one who can use them?
translation.zh:
为什么没带走
能掌控能量柱的御天敌？

translation.en: Unless...
He's the one thing they still need.
We've got to meet up with Sentinel, rendezvous with him and keep him safe.
translation.zh: 和他汇合 保他平安

translation.en: Mearing, I just picked up Sentinel. Optimus is ten minutes behind. We're coming to NEST now.
translation.zh: 我们要去总部 擎天柱随后就到

translation.en: Mr. Witwicky, I thought I made it clear to you
that I did not want you calling this phone.
Listen, the whole thing has been a setup since the beginning.
translation.zh: 听我说 整件事从一开始就是个圈套

translation.en: The Decepticons wanted Optimus to find Sentinel because only Optimus could revive him.
translation.zh: 狂派要擎天柱找到御天敌

translation.en: But we have the space bridge.
translation.zh:
-因为只有他能救活他
-但我们有太空桥

translation.en: Mearing, you have five pillars. I just learned that they have hundreds.
translation.zh: 你有五根能量柱 而他们有几百根

translation.en: You're doing exactly what they wanted you to do.
What do you need me to say to you?
The Decepticons are coming for Sentinel Prime!
We're going to NEST.
[man, on PA] We have an Energon alert. Energon readings detected on the D.C. parkway.
translation.zh:
超能量警示
华盛顿公园大道出现超能量

translation.en: Currently tracking three black Suburbans.
translation.zh: 正在追踪三辆黑色巨无霸

translation.en: [Sam] Bee, you got to get Sentinel out of here! You got to guard him!
translation.zh: 大黄蜂 把御天敌带走！保护好他

translation.en: Oh, mein Gott! I'm fired!
translation.zh: 天啊 我会被炒鱿鱼！

translation.en: Watch out! Watch out! Watch out!
Got you!
Shoot him! Shoot him! Shoot him, Bee!
Bee, you've got to move faster! Faster, Bee! Go!
Bee!
All right, back to NEST!
Dino, I got him!
Ironhide!
Whoa. A little Mexican standoff we got here.
Weapons down.
And we'll let you escape with your dignity.
translation.zh: 我们会给你们面子 让你们全身而退

translation.en: [Ironhide] Drop them.
That's good.
[Sideswipe] Ironhide, watch out!
Ironhide, catch!
Behind you!
Decepticon punk!
Class dismissed.
Get inside! Let's go!
-[Sam] Lennox! -Go, go, go!
We got Decepticons everywhere.
I've got my whole team deployed looking for them. Ironhide!
Protect Sentinel. Get him locked up inside.
Consider it done.
Hey, you've got to guard him, 'cause he's the key to the whole thing.
translation.zh: 保护好他 他是全局的关键

translation.en: Indeed, I am. What you must realize, my Autobot brothers,
translation.zh: 博派弟兄们 你们必须清楚…

translation.en: is we were never going to win the war.
For the sake of our planet's survival, a deal had to be made
translation.zh: 为了我们星球的安危 我不得已和…

translation.en: with Megatron.
-Get back! -What have you done?
I hereby discharge you from duty.
-Bee! -Get back!
Rally all NEST forces back to the base! Come on! -No... -Come on.
translation.zh: 全体人员 撤回基地！跟我走！

translation.en: Get a medic down here!
We don't have enough men! Do not engage Sentinel!
[Mearing] Just go to the back gate.
Take cover!
Watch left! Watch left!
[Mearing] Let's go! Follow me!
-Director, don't go there! -Stand down!
Hey, Sentinel!
-Director! -[Mearing] What is going on? What do you think you are doing?
translation.zh: 出了什么事？你在干什么？

translation.en: I am a Prime!
I do not take orders from you.
Director Mearing, come on. We can't fight him. Let's go. We have to go.
translation.zh: 局长 快走吧 我们不是他的对手

translation.en: Now, return what belongs to me!
Oh, my God!
-[soldier 1] You guys okay? -[soldier 2] Is everybody out?
translation.zh:
-大家没事吧？
-都出来 都出来了吗？

translation.en: Everybody, stay calm. You're gonna be fine.
translation.zh: 兄弟 别慌 你会没事的 慢慢呼吸

translation.en: Yeah, take a look, Optimus! This is all on you!
translation.zh:
擎天柱 看看吧！
这都是你干的好事！

translation.en: Sentinel hit the vault. Took the pillars.
translation.zh: 御天敌闯进保险柜 拿走能量柱

translation.en: Come on, let's go. All right, notify the 101st Airborne!
translation.zh: 快走 通知101空降部队

translation.en: We need to hunt this thing down!
Carly!
[Ron] Hot from our little campfire. -S'mores. Isn't that great? -Aww.
translation.zh: 刚刚烤好的 夹心棉花糖

translation.en: We're really living off the land.
[Sam] Mom, Dad, have you guys seen Carly come home yet?
translation.zh: 妈 爸 看到卡莉回家了吗？

translation.en: Excuse me. Can you knock, please? This is our bedroom.
translation.zh: 请敲门 这是我们的卧室

translation.en: -Why wouldn't she be at home? -We had a fight, and we might have broken up,
translation.zh:
-她不在家吗？
-我们吵了一架 也许分手了 或是暂时分开 我不清楚

translation.en: or be on a break. I don't really know.
translation.zh: 也许分手了 或是暂时分开 我不清楚

translation.en: -What? No. -Look, I can't talk about it right now.
translation.zh:
-什么？
-现在没法跟你们讲 -别跟我开玩笑
-我不能多说

translation.en: -I can't go into details, Mom. I have to find her. -You gotta be kidding me.
Sit down. We're having a family meeting. Family meeting!
translation.zh: 坐下 我们要开家庭会议

translation.en: You may not know this,
translation.zh: 你可能不知道 我和你爸也不总是

translation.en: but your father and I were not always this perfectly happy.
translation.zh: 你可能不知道 我和你爸也不总是 那么和睦幸福

translation.en: You know, there was a time in our marriage
when I thought this was not gonna work out.
translation.zh:
-有一阵子我觉得婚姻难以维持
-别再说了

translation.en: -Can we please not? -She's damaging him.
translation.zh:
-我很努力理解这一切
-她要数落他了

translation.en: You break up with one world-class hottie--
translation.zh:
-你甩掉了一个顶级辣妹
-别说了

translation.en: No. Stop. Stop, okay? She dumped me, I moved on to something better. That's it. I'm a happier person.
translation.zh: 是她甩掉我 我现在有了更好的目标

translation.en: -The second beautiful girl, you lose her. -Why don't you help me?
translation.zh: 我比以前更快乐 快帮我解解围

translation.en: -They had an argument. -[Sam] One fight.
[Judy] You're not gonna get a third one. I mean, unless you have like a big...
translation.zh: 事不过三 除非你有大…

translation.en: What the... Ma!
Maybe you just don't know what you're doing.
translation.zh:
-...不知道你在做什么
-我不想谈那个

translation.en: -I don't want to talk about this anymore. -You need the book.
translation.zh:
-...不知道你在做什么
-我不想谈那个 -你得多读书
-男人总是错的 认了吧

translation.en: -Tell him about the book. -You're always wrong. Get used to it.
translation.zh:
-你得多读书
-男人总是错的 认了吧

translation.en: Okay. You've gotta read this. She Comes First. -There's some killer shit in here. -No. No.
translation.zh: 你得看这本书 《女性至上》

translation.en: -That's it, I'm going. -No! No!
Sit down, sit down! Back me up!
-Happy wife, happy life. -Heck yeah.
translation.zh:
-老婆快乐 人生快乐
-是的

translation.en: Unhappy wife, stone-cold misery for the rest of your--
translation.zh: 老婆不快乐 终生痛苦

translation.en: -Stop. -It's true.
All I'm saying is, do you love this girl?
She's the one. Then you gotta go get her.
I mean, your dad and I, when we had troubles,
he moved heaven and earth to find me.
translation.zh: 我和你爸吵完架 他上天入地也要找到我

translation.en: Say what you said. Say it.
translation.zh: 说你的爱情宣言 快说！

translation.en: [Ron] "I will follow you to the end of time."
Does that suck or what? -It's like a bad sci-fi film. -No. It is so sweet.
translation.zh:
-像三流科幻电影里的台词
-不 很甜蜜

translation.en: I want you to get out of the city. You get as far away from here as you can. You understand?
translation.zh: 我要你们离开这里 愈远愈好

translation.en: I love you.
Ah, my master! Such a brilliant scheme!
So when Sentinel left Cybertron, it was to defect?
translation.zh: 御天敌为了投敌离开赛博坦？

translation.en: He was meant to rendezvous with me here on Earth
before fate waylaid us both.
The only way to revive him,
we needed Prime and his Matrix.
translation.zh: 我们需要擎天柱和他的领导母体

translation.en: [Starscream] Excellent strategy.
Mine, mine!
So he is now your partner, master?
translation.zh: 主人 他现在是你的伙伴了吗？

translation.en: He is my greatest triumph.
So impressive.
Commencing transport.
Stop! No! No, Sentinel! Forgive me.
Here we are.
Fight us now.
Autobots, retreat!
Why, Sentinel, why?
For Cybertron! For our home!
translation.zh: 为了我们的家园赛博坦

translation.en: What war destroyed, we can rebuild!
But only if we join with the Decepticons.
translation.zh: 但条件是必须和狂派结盟

translation.en: No, it's not the only way. This is our home. We must defend the humans.
translation.zh:
不一定非得这样 这里才是我们的家
我们必须捍卫人类！

translation.en: So lost you are, Optimus.
translation.zh: 擎天柱 你本末倒置

translation.en: On Cybertron, we were gods.
And here, they call us machines.
translation.zh: 在这里人类却说我们是机器

translation.en: Let the humans serve us, or perish.
translation.zh: 人类必须向我们称臣 否则杀无赦！

translation.en: You're lucky I didn't kill you. In time you'll see.
translation.zh: 我不杀你算你走运 到时你自然会明白

translation.en: It's not over.
[Dylan] Now, if I were him, I wouldn't let you out of my sight for one second.
translation.zh: 如果我是他… …不会让你离开半步

translation.en: It's funny. I was just thinking on the way over here, I could really use some advice from Dylan, and there he is.
translation.zh: 真巧 我正想借用迪伦给我建议

translation.en: -Can I speak to you, Carly? -Welcome. Please, sit down. Have a drink.
translation.zh:
-卡莉 我们能谈谈吗？
-欢迎 喝一杯 喝一杯

translation.en: You know what, I don't need a drink. Or a car, or a job. I just need to speak to my girlfriend alone.
translation.zh:
我不需要酒 跑车或工作
我只需要和我女友谈谈

translation.en: Is that okay with you, Mr. Inappropriate?
Excuse me.
-[Carly] What's going on? -[Sam] I'll tell you outside.
I really think I can help you, Sam.
translation.zh: 山姆 我真心想帮你的

translation.en: I remember a talk I had with my dad once about tough choices.
translation.zh: 我爸曾和我谈过艰难的决择

translation.en: Yeah, now's not the time. We'll set something up, though.
translation.zh: 现在我没空 我们有机会再聊吧

translation.en: Of course, it was way back, when my dad's firm was in charge of budget review and accounting for NASA.
translation.zh:
我爸的会计事务所
负责审核太空总署的预算

translation.en: You see, the thing that he taught me was,
translation.zh: 他教过我 对于不是你的战争

translation.en: when it's not your war, you join the side that's going to win.
translation.zh: 他教过我 对于不是你的战争 要选择站在赢家那一方

translation.en: -Move. -Too direct? Or is it just me?
translation.zh:
-走吧
-我太唐突了吗？ -是我的错吗？
-当然不是

translation.en: Certainly not you, sir.
-[Carly screams] -[Soundwave] You're mine!
No!
-Get help! -Sam, I can't get out!
-[Sam] Someone get help! -Good night!
[Carly] Get me out of here!
[Sam] Help! Get help!
-He's young. He will learn. Good night. -Get me out!
translation.zh:
-他还年轻 他会学乖
-放我出来

translation.en: It was a fun night.
You really think you're the first man ever asked to join the noble alien cause?
translation.zh: 你以为你是第一个被邀请加入

translation.en: Who are you?
