Do you know why we've not been back to the moon since 1972?
translation.zh:
你知道美国自1972年后
为何不再登陆月球？

translation.en: Because these two,
they came to my dad and they told him to do some creative accounting.
translation.zh: …找上我爸让他在账面上做一些手脚

translation.en: Make it way too expensive to ever go back. So, he and the others shut down the American and Russian space programs.
translation.zh: 我爸他们就关闭了美苏航空项目

translation.en: And they've been our clients ever since.
translation.zh:
-而狂派自此就成为我的客户
-你帮他们杀人？

translation.en: You helped them kill people? You think they'd give you a choice?
Besides, it's not like I personally participated. I am a liaison. I liaise.
translation.zh: 我并没有直接参与 我只是联络人

translation.en: It's hostile takeover time, Sam.
Sam!
Sam! -Let her go! -Sam!
Sam!
[Dylan] I've had my eye on you for years, Sam.
translation.zh: 这几年来我一直在盯着你

translation.en: You're the one spy I've never been able to provide as someone close to the Autobots.
Sam! Don't do what he wants!
Yes, he will.
They all do.
They will slaughter her, you understand me?
translation.zh: 他们会杀了她 懂吗？

translation.en: In the time it takes you to blink,
translation.zh: 他们杀她和我不费吹灰之力

translation.en: they'll do it to her, and they'll do it to me.
translation.zh: 他们杀她和我不费吹灰之力 所以你得识相点 尊敬

translation.en: So you show a little respect
translation.zh: 所以你得识相点 尊敬

translation.en: when someone offers you a job!
Wrist.
You are to track down Optimus Prime, because you're the one human he trusts,
translation.zh: 你要找到擎天柱 他只信任你一个

translation.en: and you will ask one question.
How does he intend to fight back?
Strategies, tactics, everything!
translation.zh: 要采用的战略战术等等

translation.en: Has a nasty little bite, doesn't it? It's very high-tech.
translation.zh: 很痛吧？ 这是高科技

translation.en: It lets us see what you see, hear what you hear, and it taps your nervous system.
translation.zh:
能让我们清楚你耳闻目睹的一切
它接到你的神经系统

translation.en: So, if you so much as try and signal...
translation.zh: 如果你胆敢向他们示警…

translation.en: I don't know what to tell you, Sam. Relationships have consequences.
translation.zh: 山姆 人际关系往往令人福祸难料

translation.en: I am here because of my father.
translation.zh: 我的今天拜我父亲所赐

translation.en: She is here because of you.
Stop, stop! Stop! Stop!
Soundwave, would you please?
Sam, do your job.
translation.zh: 山姆 乖乖听话 她会没事的

translation.en: She'll be safe. I give you my word.
I'll kill you. You have my word.
translation.zh: 我发誓一定不会放过你

translation.en: [Morshower] Combatant Commands are now at DEFCON 1.
translation.zh: 作战司令部进入一级战备状态

translation.en: Approximately 200 Decepticons are now in hiding.
translation.zh: 约有两百个狂派潜伏在各地

translation.en: Energon detectors have been triggered as far away as South America and China.
translation.zh:
世界各地都侦测到超能量
包括南美和中国

translation.en: The U.N. just received an encrypted audio file.
translation.zh: 联合国刚刚收到加密音频文件

translation.en: They say it's from the leader of the Autobots.
[Sentinel] Defenders of Earth,
we have come for your natural resources to rebuild our damaged planet.
translation.zh:
我们来借用你们的自然资源
来重建我们受损的星球

translation.en: When we have transported all we need,
translation.zh: 我们转移完需要的东西后

translation.en: we will leave your world in peace.
translation.zh: 我们会撤退你们的世界

translation.en: For such peace to exist,
you must immediately exile the Autobot rebels you have harbored.
translation.zh:
为了达到这一目标 你们必须立刻驱逐
你们庇护的博派叛徒

translation.en: Non-negotiable.
Renounce the rebels.
We await your reply.
[Mearing] We'll debrief you in transit.
Yeah, I really don't see how I can be of any help. I mean, you guys seem pretty busy.
translation.zh: 我不知道我能帮什么忙

translation.en: We could just do this another time, I think.
I have underestimated you at every turn.
What?
You warned us that they were using humans.
translation.zh: 你警告我们他们在利用人类

translation.en: And you knew that Sentinel was the key.
translation.zh: 你早就知道御天敌才是关键

translation.en: [man] Director!
Who am I? Hey, you're the expert. I'm just a walking security risk.
translation.zh:
你们才是专家
我不过是你们的安全隐患

translation.en: Are you all right?
-Yes. -No, you're not. You're sweating.
translation.zh:
-没事
-不 你有事 你出汗了 因为我很紧张 所以满头大汗

translation.en: I'm fine. I'm fine. I'm sweating because I'm nervous.
translation.zh: 因为我很紧张 所以满头大汗

translation.en: I'm nervous because you got me in here with this information. Okay, I'm a Twitter junkie. I blog everything.
translation.zh: 因为你告诉我这一情报

translation.en: -I can't keep a secret to save my life. -You wouldn't dare. That's the truth. I'm telling you.
translation.zh:
-别告诉我机密情报 我怕会泄漏
-你敢吗？

translation.en: Director, the Pentagon's calling in 15.
translation.zh: 局长 五角大楼15分钟后会打电话来

translation.en: -What are you doing? -Nothing. What are you doing?
Get away from me.
It's been a remarkable series of events today at the Capitol.
translation.zh: 今天一系列大事件将载入国会史册

translation.en: Just moments ago, legislation was passed
translation.zh: 今天一系列大事件将载入国会史册 决定赶走博派

translation.en: to exile the Autobots from American shores.
translation.zh: 决定赶走博派 美军和博派之间的联盟正式宣告结束

translation.en: The U.S. military alliance with them -is officially over. -[phone vibrating]
translation.zh: 美军和博派之间的联盟正式宣告结束

translation.en: In the words of the House Majority Leader, the sponsor of today's resolution, -"We cannot in good conscience..." -[Mearing] Okay.
What? They can't do this.
translation.zh:
-“我们不能昧着良心…”
-什么？ 他们不能这样 你得告诉他们

translation.en: You gotta tell them. They can't do that.
translation.zh: 他们不能这样 你得告诉他们

translation.en: Okay. It's official. It's a go, people.
translation.zh: 立法通过了 各位 出发吧

translation.en: These are our allies. The Autobots fought for us. They fought with us.
translation.zh: 他们是盟友 和我们并肩作战

translation.en: And where are we now? Facing an enemy invasion
with an enemy that has the means to deploy countless more.
translation.zh: 面对一次外星人的大举进犯

translation.en: If there is any more you know,
anything at all about the enemy's intentions...
now is the time to tell.
Autobots have no way of leaving this planet.
And that is where you're wrong.
Its name is the Xanthium.
It brought the second wave of Autobots,
translation.zh: 第二波博派乘坐它来到了地球

translation.en: and it's been under NASA's care and study ever since.
translation.zh: 之后太空总署就一直在研究它

translation.en: We linked it with a decommissioned shuttle
translation.zh:
我们利用一艘
退役的飞船和它进行了链接

translation.en: to maintain military control until they're gone.
translation.zh: 在他们离开之前一直掌控它

translation.en: Gonna be 10,000 pounds of torque on that itsy-bitsy bolt, not 19!
You're gonna risk the lives of all me mates! I'll ball you!
These guys are the Wreckers. They take care of the Xanthium.
translation.zh: 这些清障者负责维修仓耳号

translation.en: We don't let them off the base much, 'cause they're assholes.
translation.zh: 他们是惹事精 所以哪里都不准去

translation.en: You gotta pull that, ya nancy wanker!
It's time to kill him!
I'm just trying to help, you know. Just doing my job.
[Epps] Just calm down. Leave him alone. This is a human being.
translation.zh: 冷静点 别惹他 这是人类

translation.en: -Epps! -[Roadbuster] You are ridiculous!
-[Sam] Is that you? -What up, man? -What are you doing here? -[electronic whirring]
I retired from the Air Force.
Can you let my hand go?
What the hell was that?
Now I just consult to run interference for them.
translation.zh: 我现在负责管这些清障者

translation.en: [Roadbuster] Well, you're not helping!
No more combat and aliens shooting at my ass. I got a dream job.
translation.zh: 不用再和外星人大战三百回了

translation.en: [Roadbuster] Time to get off this planet.
translation.zh:
-终于找了一份好工作
-该离开地球了

translation.en: Kicking the Autobots out. Can you believe this is happening?
Where do you think it's taking them?
Any planet but here.
I wanna talk to whoever's in charge here.
translation.zh: 我要和这里的负责人谈谈！

translation.en: Well, well, well. Charlotte Mearing.
Agent Simmons. Former Agent Simmons.
So, I see you survived Washington.
translation.zh: 看来华盛顿没能整垮你

translation.en: Washington, Egypt, heartbreak. I survive. I will survive.
translation.zh:
华盛顿 埃及 失恋算什么
我天生福大命大

translation.en: They're bringing everybody in, kid. Putting all the intel on the table.
And if you think deporting nine Autobots is gonna solve a damn thing--
translation.zh: 如果你觉得把9个博派驱逐出境 就能解决麻烦...

translation.en: It's out of my hands.
Moving up in the world, huh?
Your booty looks excellent.
translation.zh: 不过屁股还是一样迷人

translation.en: If you ever say a word to anyone about what happened that night in Quantico,
translation.zh: 你敢把康特口那晚的事说出来

translation.en: I'll cut your heart out.
You already did.
[Wheelie] Sammy, listen to me. Don't let them exile us.
translation.zh: 山姆 听我说 别让他们驱逐我们

translation.en: Don't let them take us, Sam.
translation.zh: 山姆 别让他们驱逐我们

translation.en: It's a Decepticon trap.
[Leadfoot] Check the nitrogen levels. We're booking out of here.
translation.zh: 检查氮气量 我们要走人了

translation.en: Optimus?
What your leaders say is true. This was all my fault.
translation.zh: 你们的领导说的对 之前都怪我

translation.en: I told them whom to trust. I was so wrong.
translation.zh:
我告诉他们谁可以相信
但其实我大错特错

translation.en: That doesn't make it your fault. It just makes you human for a change.
translation.zh: 这不能算你的错 说明你更像人类

translation.en: Remember this.
You may lose your faith in us,
translation.zh: 你们也许对我们失去信心

translation.en: but never in yourselves.
translation.zh: 但绝对不能对自己失去信心

translation.en: I need to know how you're gonna fight back.
translation.zh: 能告诉我你要怎样反击吗？

translation.en: I know this is strategy, I know you're coming back
translation.zh: 我知道你会带着增援回来

translation.en: with reinforcements, something. I know there's a plan.
translation.zh: 我知道你会带着增援回来 你一定有计划

translation.en: You can tell me. No other human will ever know.
translation.zh: 你一定有计划 你可以告诉我 我会守口如瓶

translation.en: There is no plan.
If we just do what they want, how are we gonna live with ourselves?
translation.zh:
我们听他们的吩咐
怎么对得起自己？

translation.en: You are my friend, Sam.
You always will be.
But your leaders have spoken.
translation.zh: 但你们的领导已发话了

translation.en: From here...
the fight will be your own.
[Optimus] Make it short.
We're loading up.
[Leadfoot] All right, hustle up! We're launching at dawn.
We're gonna do whatever we can. Make it like it was.
translation.zh: 我们会竭尽所能保护地球

translation.en: You will always be my friend, Sam.
translation.zh: 山姆 你…永远是…我的朋友

translation.en: I gotta be going on.
Years from now, they're gonna ask us,
"Where were you when they took over the planet?"
translation.zh: 狂派占领地球时 你们在哪里？

translation.en: We're gonna say,
"We just stood by and watched."
[Dylan] You should really look at this as a partnership.
You have to stand on the side of progress
translation.zh: 如果你想见证历史的话

translation.en: if you wanna be a part of history.
[launch announcer] Seven, six, five,
four, three, two, one, zero.
Go ahead and throttle up.
First flight.
translation.zh:
可以加速了 -顺利起飞
-收到

translation.en: You wanted an answer. You got one.
translation.zh:
-你要答案 我给你
-我总能如愿以偿 山姆

translation.en: I always get what I want, Sam. We just needed to be sure.
translation.zh:
-你要答案 我给你
-我总能如愿以偿 山姆 我们得确保一件事

translation.en: -Sure of what? -That they would go without a fight.
translation.zh: 确保什么？ 他们乖乖地离开

translation.en: -[man] Say again. -[woman] We're tracking an incoming object.
We all work for the Decepticons now.
translation.zh: 现在我们都得替狂派做事

translation.en: I need your help to track a phone call. There's a man on this phone.
translation.zh: 你得帮我追踪一个电话

translation.en: He's the head of their human operations, and he has Carly hostage.
translation.zh: 电话里的人是他们的头

translation.en: I want you to sit down. Don't move.
Follow me.
I'm watching him drive up right now.
[Dutch] The call was placed en route. I'm hacking into the phone's camera now.
translation.zh: 我正破解手机的摄像镜头

translation.en: There, that's it. That's a live stream from the camera.
Someplace... Hold on. I can triangulate this.
translation.zh: 等一下 让我来定位

translation.en: Okay, it's Chicago cell sites. There, I've got it.
translation.zh: 芝加哥手机网 就在那里

translation.en: Trump Tower, Chicago. Lower penthouse.
translation.zh: 芝加哥特朗普大楼的顶楼

translation.en: We're on.
-I'm going. -[Simmons] You sure?
She's done nothing but try to help me, and I can be there in 15 hours.
translation.zh: 她想帮我而被抓 我15小时后赶到

translation.en: [Epps] You're not going alone.
I still got my NEST friends out there.
I'll round them up, we'll find your girlfriend, we're gonna bring this guy in.
translation.zh: 我会召集他们 找到你女友

translation.en: Why are you helping me?
'Cause that asshole killed my friends, too.
translation.zh: 因为那个混蛋也杀害了我的朋友

translation.en: They said they were here for our resources, to rebuild their planet.
translation.zh:
他们声称要地球的资源 -来重建他们的星球
-没错

translation.en: Yes, but really one resource in particular.
One unique to our planet.
Us?
You're very smart.
You see, they can't rebuild without a slave labor force.
translation.zh: 他们得有劳动力才能重建

translation.en: How many rocks up there in the universe offer six billion workers?
translation.zh: 试问哪一颗星球有60亿个工人？

translation.en: What are you talking about? We can't transport people.
translation.zh: 我不明白 他们又不能运送人类

translation.en: They're not shipping people. They're shipping their planet here.
translation.zh:
不用运人
他们会把他们的星球运过来

translation.en: [Carly] Oh, my God.
What's Sentinel doing here?
[Dylan] Watch. They're spreading hundreds of pillars around the globe right now.
translation.zh: 看 他们在全球各地安置能量柱

translation.en: In just a few hours, they're gonna launch them into orbit
translation.zh: 几个小时内 他们就会进入近地轨道

translation.en: and bring Cybertron into our atmosphere.
The red one there controls the rest. He triggers that, it starts the whole thing.
Be gone, insect operative. Your work is done.
translation.zh: 你的任务结束了 滚吧 小东西

translation.en: Your Excellency. He's such a dick.
translation.zh: 遵命 他是个大混蛋

translation.en: You want this to happen?
translation.zh:
-你希望这种事发生吗？
-我只想活命

translation.en: I want to survive. I want 40 more years.
translation.zh:
-你希望这种事发生吗？
-我只想活命 我想再活40年
你以为是我自找的吗？

translation.en: You think I asked for this? I inherited a client.
translation.zh:
我想再活40年
你以为是我自找的吗？ -我爸爸把这个客户转给了我
-当然了

translation.en: Yeah, and when Cybertron's here and we're all their slaves, I guess they'll still need a human leader.
translation.zh:
当全人类沦为奴隶后
他们会需要一个人类当领导

translation.en: Don't jinx me. You want to survive, you listen to me.
translation.zh: 闭上你的乌鸦嘴 想活就老实点

translation.en: It is time for the slaves of Earth to recognize their masters.
translation.zh: 地球上的这些奴隶该拜见主人了

translation.en: Seal off the city.
Get the dogs out of here now! Get them in the back!
I guess they didn't tell you about this part, did they?
translation.zh: 我猜他们没告诉你毁城这件事

translation.en: -You think I'm at every meeting? -[breathing heavily]
translation.zh: 你以为每次开会我都必到吗？

translation.en: Look, I'm safe.
translation.zh: 我很安全 他们说过我很安全

translation.en: They said I was safe.
Let's roll!
[Epps] We had a signal earlier.
It's not working.
[man] Wrong way!
Get out of here! Go back!
There is a ring of alien ships around Chicago.
translation.zh: 芝加哥被成群的外星战舰团团包围

translation.en: Our high-range bombers were just knocked out of the sky.
translation.zh: 我们的远程轰炸机刚刚被击落

translation.en: They can't get through enemy air defenses over the city.
translation.zh: 他们无法突破敌人的空中防御 卫星也受到严重电子干扰

translation.en: Our satellites have been jammed.
translation.zh: 卫星也受到严重电子干扰

translation.en: We have no way to monitor the enemy's movement.
Our old NEST teams are on stand-down
translation.zh:
外星研究专家们目前
在葛里森空军基地待命

translation.en: holding at Grissom Air Force Base.
translation.zh:
外星研究专家们目前
在葛里森空军基地待命 我们距离战区约十分钟路程

translation.en: We're about ten minutes from the battle zone.
translation.zh: 我们距离战区约十分钟路程

translation.en: We have Special Forces trying to gain access to the city,
translation.zh: 特种部队正设法进入市区

translation.en: and infantry is staging at the perimeter.
Excuse me, excuse me, it just doesn't make sense!
Can't we get any eyes in there at all?
They keep shooting down our drones. They want us blind.
translation.zh:
-我们的飞机都被击落
-这是他们的战术

translation.en: But we do have a couple of mini-drones we're gonna try.
translation.zh: 但我们还有一些迷你侦察机

translation.en: Well, whoever's manning these UAV drones,
can we try to redirect them toward Trump Tower?
translation.zh: 能把飞机派到川普大楼吗？

translation.en: The kid, Witwickety, was on his way to Chicago.
translation.zh: 维基那小子现在正前往芝加哥

translation.en: Said some point-man human op is there for the Decepticons!
translation.zh: 他说狂派的人类内奸就在那里

translation.en: Listen, if I know anything, I know this, that kid is an alien-bad-news magnet.
translation.zh:
我就知道狂派在哪里作乱
那小子会闻风而至

translation.en: My God.
We came here to find her in the middle of all that?
translation.zh: 我们要在枪林弹雨中找到她？

translation.en: Are we really going out there, Epps?
translation.zh: 我们真的要去吗 艾普斯？

translation.en: I'm not going in there.
No one's going in.
I am.
With or without you, I'll find her.
translation.zh: 我一定要找到她 无论你帮不帮我

translation.en: You're gonna get yourself killed, Sam. Is that what you want?
translation.zh: 你会白白送命的 山姆

translation.en: Is that what you want?
You came all the way out here to get yourself killed? Huh? Listen to what I'm saying.
translation.zh: 你大老远跑来就是为了送死？

translation.en: She's here because of me. Do you understand?
Listen, if you go in this building,
that's if she's even still alive,
there's no way you're gonna be able to reach her!
What do you suggest I do?
It's over.
I'm sorry, but it's over.
translation.zh: 很遗憾 但是没戏了

translation.en: No.
Whoa! Incoming!
We will kill them all.
[Leadfoot] Wreckers, kill him!
[Roadbuster] This is going to hurt! A lot!
Your leaders will now understand.
translation.zh: 你们的领导人现在明白了

translation.en: Decepticons will never leave your planet alone.
And we needed them to believe we had gone.
translation.zh: 我们迷惑他们 让他们以为我们走了

translation.en: For today, in the name of freedom,
translation.zh: 今天 以自由之名义

translation.en: we take the battle to them!
I saw your ship blow up!
translation.zh: 我看着你们的飞船爆炸了

translation.en: The ship?
We were never in the ship! We designed the damn thing, didn't we?
translation.zh: 我们压根没在上面！ 这玩意是我们设计的 不是吗？

translation.en: We were hidden in the first booster rocket to separate.
translation.zh: 我们躲在第一枚推动火箭里

translation.en: Splashed down back in the Atlantic, just as planned.
translation.zh: 按照计划降落在大西洋上

translation.en: We ain't going nowhere.
Yeah, no one's exiling us.
The Autobots are staying right here.
We're gonna help you win this war.
translation.zh: 我们会帮你们打赢这场仗

translation.en: They're surrounding the city to make a fortress,
translation.zh: 他们把芝加哥市围成堡垒…

translation.en: so that no one can see what they're up to inside.
translation.zh: …这样没人知道他们在里面干嘛

translation.en: Our only chance is the element of surprise.
translation.zh: 我们唯一的机会是偷袭

translation.en: I think I know where to look!
[man] Mini-drone is on approach to Trump Tower.
translation.zh: 迷你侦察机接近特朗普大楼

translation.en: You're telling me Sam's headed into that?
Poor kid.
Probably never got close.
So, you can fly this thing, right?
What is that... What is that? What is that? So-so?
So you so-so can fly this. That feels terrible.
translation.zh: 你没把握 我心里也没底

translation.en: We're right behind you.
All right, we're going in!
The city is secure.
The humans cannot stop us.
[Sentinel] As the afternoon falls,
the rest of the pillars will reach their launch position.
translation.zh: 其余的能量柱都到达指定发射地点

translation.en: [Megatron] This is the victory I promised you so many years ago,
translation.zh: 多年前我向你保证的胜利就要来到

translation.en: where we rebuild Cybertron together!
translation.zh: 我们要一起重建赛博坦！

translation.en: I have deigned to work with you...
translation.zh: 我是为了拯救我们的星球…

translation.en: that our planet may survive!
I will never work for you!
translation.zh: 我永远也不会被你驱使！

translation.en: You would be wise to remember the difference.
translation.zh: 你最好给我记住这一点

translation.en: [Dylan] Ugh! I'm so sick of this. I'm just sick of waiting.
translation.zh: 这样的苦等 我受够了

translation.en: Where is she?
Where is she?
You've got some balls.
No, Sam!
No! No, no!
Carly!
Carly!
Jump!
Bee, fire!
Bee!
Autobots! They're alive! They're here!
Decepticons, defend the pillar!
translation.zh:
-他们还活着
-狂派 保护能量柱！

translation.en: [Megatron] Raise the bridges! Find them!
Sam.
You found me. I'd follow you anywhere.
translation.zh:
-你找到我了
-我会跟你到天涯海角

translation.en: [soldier] Form a perimeter! Let's go, let's go!
Well, you're crazy.
What is that? Is that us?
[Epps] This thing's a military UAV. Stone, check and see if it's still working.
translation.zh:
军方的无人驾驶侦察机
史通 看看能不能用

translation.en: [Stone] Yeah, it's still got power. Flight Control, do you copy?
translation.zh:
-还有动力
-指挥中心 收到吗？

translation.en: Can... Can you rotate? Can you do something?
translation.zh: 你们能转动摄像镜头吗？

translation.en: I think we got something.
-[Lennox] Epps! We got Epps! -...rotate, something.
translation.zh:
-是艾普斯！
-能转动摄像镜头吗？

translation.en: [Epps] Come on, work! Work!
All right, turn the volume up on that!
The kid!
Can you rotate or something?
Yes, yes! Okay, okay, okay. They can see us.
Chicago is ground zero, do you understand?
-Can you hear us? You understand? -Witwicky.
Please listen. Sentinel Prime is here, and he has the pillars to his space bridge.
translation.zh: 御天敌正准备用能量柱启动太空桥

translation.en: They're on top of a building on Chicago River. It's owned by Hotchkiss Gould Investments.
translation.zh:
他们在芝加哥河旁的
古德大楼楼顶上

translation.en: Now, the pillar that controls everything is in the southeast cupola.
translation.zh: 主控柱在东南方的圆顶上

translation.en: You've got to destroy the pillar. You have to shoot down the pillar, or they're going to transport Cybertron here, do you understand?
translation.zh:
你们得摧毁那根柱子
不然他们会把赛博坦运过来

translation.en: -Do you understand? -What?
Give me a GPS on the building and on that drone! Let's go!
translation.zh: 给那栋大楼和侦察机定位

translation.en: Mensurate those coordinates. Shorten the kill chain.
translation.zh: 测量那些坐标 缩短杀伤链

translation.en: [Lennox] Guys on the tarmac, five minutes. The southeast cupola.
All right!
We need to move before the fighters spot us. Wait here until we scout a route ahead.
translation.zh: 为防被敌机发现 我们得离开

translation.en: -Let's roll. -Ratchet, cover high.
translation.zh: 你先待这里 我们去探路 出发 飞轮 掩护我们

translation.en: Hey, think we could use that rocket to shoot down the pillar?
translation.zh: 火箭弹能击落能量柱吗？

translation.en: We're eight blocks away. We got to get closer to take a shot.
translation.zh:
距离目标还有八个街区
得更靠近一点才能开枪

translation.en: Not closer. Higher. We need a clear line of sight.
And it's across the river. Gonna have a hell of a time trying to sneak up.
translation.zh: 在河对岸 时间很紧 我们要悄悄潜入

translation.en: We only got one shot.
One shot's all we need.
[Simmons] We got to be able to see around that building from the ground.
translation.zh: 我们得从地面看到那栋大楼

translation.en: Get NSA to send service specs for any cameras in that area. Maybe some are working.
translation.zh: 叫国安局发点监控镜头的信息过来

translation.en: Traffic lights. ATMs. Anything.
translation.zh: 交通灯 自动提款机 什么都行

translation.en: [Lennox] Listen up. You want to hit back?
translation.zh: 听好了 你们想反击吗？

translation.en: We're gonna have to wingsuit in. It's the only way to get close.
translation.zh:
我们只能穿
飞行服滑翔进去 只有这一个办法

translation.en: I can't promise anyone a ride home, but if you're with me,
translation.zh:
我不敢保证都能平安地回来
但如果你们跟着我…

translation.en: the world needs you now.
I'll find my own ride home, sir.
translation.zh: 我会设法自己回来 长官

translation.en: Who else?
General Morshower, requesting diversionary action to the south of the city.
translation.zh: 莫将军 要求前往城南佯攻

translation.en: We're coming north and low. You guys drive them to the east.
translation.zh: 我们从北进攻 把敌人逼到城东

translation.en: Autobot victory! Autobot victory!
[Epps] That is one scary-ass Decepticon!
They got my trailer. I need that flight tech.
translation.zh: 我的拖车被抢走 没它我飞不了

translation.en: Shockwave can't hunt all of us at once. Wreckers,
translation.zh: 音波不能同时追杀我们每个人

translation.en: we need a diversion.
Let's get some! You got that right.
Listen, we're gonna circle around to that glass building. And we'll get high enough to make the rocket shot
while you guys draw his fire. -Let's move! -Wait a minute!
translation.zh: 你们吸引他的火力 我们走！

translation.en: I'm not letting you go out there without my urban combat prototypes.
translation.zh: 等等 带上这些全新的巷战武器

translation.en: We got to go, Que! Come on.
They're great inventions for kicking ass!
Those are boom-sticks. Armed in 30 seconds.
Grapple gloves, for climbing.
translation.zh: 钢爪手套 用来爬墙

translation.en: [soldier] Go, go! Move your ass! Move, move!
[Optimus] Move, move! Go, go, go!
-Move, move! -[Epps] Let's go!
Let's go! Run!
-Hey, hey, hey. Where you going? -No, no, no!
-Where you going? -Stop, stop, stop! Don't leave!
You never leave a bot behind! Shockwave's coming!
translation.zh: 不能丢下博派弟兄！ 震荡波要来了

translation.en: [Epps] Go for the stairs! [Sam] Epps, this way!
[pilot 1, on radio] Breaking right.
[pilot 2] Bead. Rolling in.
We got another one coming around. Coming around on the left side, coming around on the right side.
We're going to use Willis Tower for cover! Once we make altitude, we jump!
translation.zh: 我们用威利大厦当掩护！

translation.en: -A lot of airplanes out here! -Contact off the nose.
[pilot 1] Mayday! I don't think he's gonna make it.
[pilot 2] Mayday, mayday! Six-one going down. Heads up! Heads up!
Come on, come on, come on, come on.
[pilot 1] Tally on the left. [pilot 2] Got him.
Time on target: 20 seconds.
[Lennox] Here we go! Here we go!
Keep it tight!
[Baby Face] All right, focus, focus, focus.
[pilot] Threat above tower, six o'clock!
translation.zh: 上方有敌机！六点钟方向

translation.en: [Starscream] Locusts!
[pilot] Look out! Breaking right, breaking right!
[pilot 1] Watch out, watch out! [pilot 2] Holy shit!
Look out, look out, look out!
Get them out, get them out, get them out!
[Lennox] Everybody out, out, out! [soldier] Jump, jump, jump!
Get out, get out! I'm stuck!
[pilot] Now. Get them out now! Get them out now!
Help!
[soldier] Get separation. Track away, track away!
[Lennox] Hard left! Hard left!
Six hundred feet.
Check your six! Check your six!
-[Lennox] He's on our ass! -Watch out, watch out!
[Lennox] Sharp right!
Building dead ahead! Thread the needle!
translation.zh: 大楼在正前方！穿过缺口！

translation.en: [soldier] Pull, pull!
[Sam] Come on, we're high enough! [Eddie] This is a mother getting up here!
-[Epps] Get your fat ass over here! -I'm coming.
Set up the rocket! They're coming.
translation.zh:
准备火箭弹！ -他们来了
-武器情况呢？

translation.en: [Lennox] Weapons status?
29 Bot-busters, 20 piercing D-Bot.
There, the building with the dome.
translation.zh: 那里 有圆顶的大楼

translation.en: For our brothers, let's make this trip worth it.
translation.zh: 替弟兄们报仇 我们要不虚此行

translation.en: Oh, God.
Whoa, whoa.
-[soldier 1] The building! -[soldier 2] Oh, shit!
They're shooting at the building!
This is not a good idea.
-What? -This is not a good idea.
-This building is unstable. -Listen, stop for a second. If we don't do what we came to do, it doesn't matter, we all die.
Right? That's your target. Come on, man!
translation.zh: 那是你的目标 来吧！

translation.en: I don't even care if the building collapses. I'm having a heart attack anyway.
translation.zh: 大楼不塌 我也会心脏病发作

translation.en: The building is going over!
-Hang on! -Take cover!
[Epps] Keep your hands up!
It's okay! It stopped!
-[soldier] Incoming, incoming! -[Epps] Everybody hide!
[whispers] Don't move.
[Epps] Go, go.
Run! Cover fire!
[Epps] Shoot the glass! Jump out the window!
[Sam] Jump!
[soldier] We're gonna die!
[Carly] Sam, I can't stop!
Shoot the glass!
Sam! Sam!
No, no, no!
Is everybody okay?
[Sam] You okay? What the hell was that?
-This evil thing's looking at me! -What?
It's even got an uglier Decepticon with it!
We have to evac!
Sergeant Epps, the stairs are blocked! [soldier] We're trapped!
Okay. How do we get out of here? Hey! Come on!
Oh, Lord Jesus, let me just get out of this alive.
translation.zh: 我会做个好人 让我活着出去吧

translation.en: Move! We got to move!
Why do the Decepticons always get the good shit?
translation.zh: 狂派的武器都比较先进

translation.en: Move! We're about to be eaten, people!
Hold on! Give me your hand!
-I'm swinging that way! -[Hooch] Got her!
[Carly] Oh, my God!
[Sam] I'm dropping you on the fire escape!
Sam!
Whoa! We gotta move!
Move, move!
I'm coming for you!
[Roadbuster] Optimus!
Wreckers! We're coming!
Decepticons around the world,
launch the pillars.
[Wheelie] We are so lost!
[Brains] Always left out.
Ka-ching!
It's time to lay down the law.
About to bring some hurt now.
[Sam] It's starting! You see it?
Look out!
Where are Sam and Carly?
We'll go this way.
I give you one thing to do, one thing to do, and you drop the ball on that?
translation.zh: 你只做一件事 还搞砸了？

translation.en: I ain't signed up for all this! Got aliens blasting at me, running around, chasing me!
translation.zh: 我没料到会被外星人追杀！

translation.en: I'm ducking through churches, and buildings, and all that kind of crap!
translation.zh: 还要躲闪倒塌的教堂和大楼！

translation.en: This is bullshit! I ain't signed up for this, Epps.
translation.zh: 太扯淡了 艾普斯 我真没料到这个

translation.en: I'm trying to keep it together.
-What a treat! You and me, alone! -Carly!
translation.zh: 上天恩赐！你我能独处！ 卡莉！

translation.en: Come on, come on! Run!
Okay. He's after me, not you.
translation.zh: 他追的是我 不是你

translation.en: Run!
You can't hide, boy!
translation.zh: 你无处藏身了 小子！

translation.en: I just love it when your little insect feet try to run!
translation.zh: 我最爱看你们这些小虫子逃跑

translation.en: -Sam! -Run!
I thought you were working for us, boy?
No! Sam!
My eye!
My eye!
Target the Decepticon!
[Carly] Sam!
Please, you've got to save Sam! -You've got to save him! -What the hell is he doing?
translation.zh: 蓝尼 你得去救山姆！

translation.en: This better work.
D-Bots! D-Bots!
I can't see! I can't see!
Sam!
It's on my hand! Grab the knife! Knife! -I'm trying! -Knife, knife, knife, knife, knife!
The bomb's gonna blow! The bomb's gonna...
translation.zh:
-正在拿！
-刀！ 炸弹要爆炸了！

translation.en: You human scum!
-We got 20 seconds on that bomb! -What bomb?
You see that bomb? Cut it, cut it, cut it!
[Lennox] I got it! How long do we have?
[Starscream] I'm gonna kick you!
I'm gonna kill--
Well, he's dead.
Hey, Bee's going to run with the rest of the Autobots -and meet us at the edge of the river. -All right.
translation.zh: 大黄蜂去找他的弟兄跟我们汇合

translation.en: [Wheelie] It sucked me in. There was nothing I could do.
translation.zh: 我被吸进来了！没办法啊！

translation.en: This is a total cluster...
We got to get across the river.
You see that? She said the control pillar -was in that first cupola. -All right.
translation.zh:
看到没？她说主控柱就在
那边第一个楼的楼顶

translation.en: Let's go! Move! Let's move!
[man, on radio] Tomahawks are inbound.
ETA: 20 minutes.
I'm in the traffic cameras.
translation.zh: 我接通了交通监管系统

translation.en: [man] Four Autobots are captured.
[Mearing] Oh, my God. We're helpless.
Whatever's set to happen, with those pulses getting faster, it's gonna happen soon.
translation.zh:
能量波越来越快
注定的事很快要发生

translation.en: [man] No sign of Optimus.
[Lennox] How do we get these bridges down?
Spread out. Check in there.
Epps!
Epps, I've been looking for your ass. How you doing?
Retirement is wack. Even worse,
translation.zh: 糟糕透顶 更糟的是

translation.en: we can't get across the river to that building, and the Autobots are upstairs, surrounded.
translation.zh: 博派在楼上被团团包围

translation.en: Just pan the camera around, all right? All right. Pan... Pan right. That's you.
Try getting into the bridge control room.
[Mearing] What are they doing? They're just standing there.
translation.zh: 他们干嘛站在那里不动？

translation.en: Hang on. Dutch, see if you can hack into the bridge.
translation.zh: 达奇 试着进入大桥主控电脑

translation.en: [soldier] Sir, SEALs are here.
It's a good day, boys! What do you got? Got a ten-man SEAL unit, sir, tasked with vectoring Tomahawks.
translation.zh:
-好日子！有多少人？
-十个人为战斧导弹导航

translation.en: -How long? -Fifteen.
[Soundwave] You're my prisoners! Take it easy. We surrender.
translation.zh: 别紧张 我们投降了

translation.en: [Autobot] Get off me.
Get off me!
[Lennox] All right, you're gonna need your 40 Mike-Mikes and your frags.
translation.zh: 你们需要用自动榴弹发射器

translation.en: The vibrations jack up their circuits. Snipers, shoot for the eyes.
translation.zh:
爆炸冲击波会让他们短路
狙击手 朝着他们眼睛开枪

translation.en: All right, your target is up on top of that building, that cupola.
translation.zh: 目标是那栋大楼的那个圆顶

translation.en: How doomed you are, Autobots.
translation.zh: 博派 你们劫数难逃

translation.en: You simply fail to understand
that the needs of the many outweigh the needs of the few.
Activating the bridge.
They happy about something.
We're in the heart of their ship.
translation.zh: 我们在他们母舰的中心

translation.en: Let's give 'em a little ride.
[laughs] We gonna screw this ship up.
[Dutch] It's a 128K binary encryption code.
It's difficult.
But not for me. I'm in. Bridge down.
translation.zh: 不过难不倒我 我进去了

translation.en: The bridge is coming down! Someone's watching over us!
Come on! Let's go!
translation.zh: 老天爷保佑我们 我们走！

translation.en: "Pleasure working with you, Seymour,"
I believe you're supposed to say.
Good job, Dutch.
[Ratchet] Get off me!
[Roadbuster] Hurry! They're triggering the pillars!
translation.zh: 快点！他们正在启动能量柱！

translation.en: Prisoners? You're keeping prisoners?
Yes.
You need to teach them about respect.
This was all business, but now it's personal, do you understand me?
translation.zh:
这本来是公事
现在变成私仇 明白吗？

translation.en: I understand. No prisoners, only trophies.
translation.zh: 不要俘虏 只要战利品

translation.en: Bee, I think they're going to kill us.
translation.zh: 大黄蜂 他们要杀了我们

translation.en: -You, your time is up. -Wait, wait, wait!
We surrendered! We're your prisoners.
translation.zh: 我们投降了 是战俘

translation.en: -Move it! -Can't we talk this out?
translation.zh:
-快点！
-没得商量吗？ 我们都是好人呀！

translation.en: We're all a bunch of good chaps! I mean you no... Ugh!
Why did you--
Goodbye, my old friend.
You're mine now.
Get off me!
-I got to help him. -What?
What are you doing?
-I got to help him. -Sam, you can't help him.
Sam!
Turn around.
We... We gave 'em a hell of a run.
We did it, Brains! We did it! Rip this ship apart.
-We had a nice run, Brains, you and me. -Yeah, we gonna die.
translation.zh:
-真好玩
-是啊 我们死定了

translation.en: Come on.
Whoa, whoa, whoa! Okay, baby! You all come with us!
[Lennox] Go! You guys, follow that ground team! Go!
[soldier] Move, move, move! [Lennox] Epps, third floor! We're going to 45!
translation.zh:
-快去！
-艾普斯 三楼！我们去45楼！

translation.en: All right. Two snipers, right here!
All right, dock up!
We jump in three minutes!
Set up shop right here.
Set up.
I'm downstairs. We got five targets and Shockwave right below us.
translation.zh:
我在楼下 有五个目标
震荡波就在下面

translation.en: Stand by to jump!
All right, let's go! Get ready, get ready.
Go!
Snipers, take out their eyes.
-[groans] -All right, demo team, let's crank steel.
Turning steel!
Don't fire till I tell you!
[Lennox] Go!
Good job, kid!
Fire!
-We got him! -Yeah!
He's on the run!
Autobots, attack!
Mortar that bridge!
It's our world now!
Commence transport!
Oh, my God. Oh, my God.
Optimus!
You die! Hyah!
No!
[Optimus] Get down here, Sentinel!
Optimus...
you forget your place!
I bring you Cybertron, your home...
translation.zh:
我想把你们送回赛博坦
送你们回家

translation.en: and still you choose humanity.
You were the one who taught me freedom is everyone's right.
translation.zh: 你教过我每个人都有选择自由的权利

translation.en: I will retrigger that pillar!
Then you'll have to go through me!
Okay, I've got to try and help.
-I have to. You stay here. -Don't you go. Don't go.
You're gonna be fine, okay? I promise. I got to get to that pillar.
translation.zh:
-我保证你不会有事的
-确定吗？ 行吗？我要去能量柱那边

translation.en: Charge the pillar!
We got Autobots!
[Sentinel] Reinforcements!
Decepticon ships, fire at Optimus!
translation.zh: 狂派战舰 向擎天柱开火！

translation.en: We're taking fire! I need those Tomahawks now!
translation.zh: 我们遭到攻击！快发射战斧导弹！

translation.en: [man, over radio] First wave inbound.
We've got to cover for Optimus!
Decepticons, trigger the pillar!
Restart that pillar!
Trigger the pillars.
I can't hold them! The ships have us pinned!
No!
[soldier] Inbound, ten seconds! Danger close!
translation.zh: 导弹10秒后到达 危险！

translation.en: Mark-Lima-Echo-Echo, 14250!
Positive surface contact.
-[man] Target I.D. -Target acquired.
Dylan! Wait!
Dylan!
Stop! Stop!
No!
There's only one future for me.
Cybertron, you are saved, at last.
translation.zh: 赛博坦... 你终于… …得救了

translation.en: Oh. Have you come to surrender?
-Was it all worth it? -Obviously.
All your work to bring Sentinel back,
translation.zh: 你千辛万苦把御天敌弄回来

translation.en: and now clearly he has all the power.
It's actually almost tragic.
You dare lecture me, slave?
translation.zh: 你胆敢教训我 奴隶？

translation.en: Your Decepticons finally conquering this planet,
and yet, their leader won't be you!
It will be me! It will always be me.
In any minute now,
you'll be nothing but Sentinel's bitch.
translation.zh: …你就会沦落为… 御天敌手下的走卒

translation.en: [Hooch] Rocket!
Die!
You chose sides?
You chose wrong.
[Sentinel] Always the bravest of us!
translation.zh: 你永远都是最英勇的变形金刚

translation.en: But you could never make the hard decisions!
translation.zh: 但做抉择永远不是你的强项

translation.en: Our planet will survive.
No!
We were gods once. All of us.
translation.zh: 我们都曾是神 但在这里...

translation.en: -But here... -Please!
...there will only be one!
[Megatron] This is my planet!
I just saved a whole other world.
You think you're a hero, huh? You think you're a hero?
No. I'm just a messenger.
The pillar's still connected!
[Epps] Bring it up!
-Bee! Let's do this! -[Lennox] Let's go, let's go! Move, move!
Pillar's still connected!
[Roadbuster] Rip that pillar down!
Now, we need a truce.
All I want is to be back in charge.
Besides,
who would you be without me, Prime?
Time to find out.
Optimus, all I ever wanted was the survival of our race.
translation.zh: 擎天柱 我只想延续我们的种族

translation.en: You must see why I had to betray you.
translation.zh: 你要明白我为什么背叛你

translation.en: You didn't betray me.
You betrayed yourself.
No, Optimus!
Sam.
I love you.
I love you.
You're the only thing I need in this world, and I'll do anything to make it up to you, I promise.
translation.zh: 为了你 我愿赴汤蹈火

translation.en: I'm going to hold you to that. Just never let me go.
I promise.
[Carly] Ooh. Rings.
I love this car.
-Bee, you've got to slow it down. -[laughing] You got to slow way down, okay?
I'm just trying to help out.
[Optimus] In any war,
there are calms between storms.
You fought bravely.
There will be days when we lose faith.
translation.zh: 有时候我们会失去信念

translation.en: Days when our allies turn against us.
translation.zh: 有时我们的盟友会背叛我们

translation.en: But the day will never come that we forsake this planet
translation.zh: 但是我们绝不会放弃地球...

translation.en: and its people.
That's what I call the start of a beautiful future.
translation.zh: 这才算是美好未来的开始

translation.en: -Arrest him. -[laughs]
-It was worth it! -Get him out of here!
I'd go to jail for love! I don't care!
Go ahead, take me in! I want to go in! Let's go in.
translation.zh: 马上把我关起来！我想进去！

translation.en: Come on, Charlotte, take me in right now!
translation.zh:
-我有最好的律师
-马上把我关起来！
